qcVUqZ6vexHE8dMXr0e_lQ.text: Great spot for seafood, burgers,& drinks. Plus as a bonus Billy's offers out door seating right on the lake and on a beautiful day just can't get any better if you're in the University aera of Charlotte. Service and food are Spectacular!!!!

QUngBWBKk6-wAPR-eSIb8A.text: Love broadwalkbillys tuesday po' boy is the best ever. I had a bad experience once with a waitress and didn't want to comeback. But the company took us out to eat, that when Lexxi Allen waited on us I must say she was so friendly,polite,attentive,always came a check on us. She change my view on this establishment I will definitely be back and want her serve my table.. thank you lexxi you're awesome...

spFWo92_T9nyzqni9WxsnA.text: Our server, Mike Sherrard, was phenomenal! Totes rad guy with good vibes. 10/10 would recommend . Jerk chicken was bangin.

7OCjjsRY6qw3gCYhDo61AA.text: Working on the University area this is a staple. I love the low key atmosphere and yummy food. My go too is the classic chicken finger plate. I love the borage of sauces that im able to use to grasph my appetite and attitude for the day. Did I mention that there was an awesome patio over looking a water feature...

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. They have a new menu!

1Lg_iszuyF0gqPUWMrtnJA.text: Good place.  A little more difficult to get to while road construction is going on.  I had a combo meal of wings, ribs, and sausage.  The sausage and wings were great.  The ribs were a bit tougher than I would have expected considering they were "smoked".   The coloring of the meat also brings the level of "smoking" into question with the ribs.  The place was nice the wings had a great flavor. It was like a medium citrus kind of flavor.

xYhfN7Bq-TfeN9gXRHyupQ.text: The food here is really good. The atmosphere is awesome especially during the spring/ summer when everyone is outside. Drinks are a little pricey regularly but they have good drink specials during the week.

XJkfukw6dDo0raOx2syFGg.text: Good ribs and cold beer --that's why I go back whenever I'm in town and Boardwalk Billy's doesn't disappoint.  Nice location on the lake and friendly staff.  Due to the angle the restaurant is set at, it can get pretty bright and warm at sunset, but not enough to deter anyone from wanting to go.

OsQ8g696Twvx6NaeLlq4qw.text: Had a great time!  Bree was as friendly as could be and the overall vibe had southern charm. We sat on the patio overlooking the lake. Ordered a steam bowl with shrimp and crab legs. Also, got a side of ribs and fried green tomatoes. Everything was on point. Not to mention the pricing for both the food and drinks was affordable. $3 for fried green tomatoes and $7 for 4 ribs. Best meal I've had in town so far. Wish we had this in Atlanta!

FCErD7mICzqXh8ooaQl3lQ.text: This is literally your typical college bar, with a beach twist to it. They have good wings, burgers, and fries but everything is only okay. I always get their burger, fries and wings trio and that's enough food to hold me over for a while. Their nachos I will say are the best I have ever had! My boyfriend and I love getting them and splitting them, they're so good. I will say do not get their coconut shrimp. Soggy, and squishy, not very crisp and juicy like I was hoping for.  However if you're looking for a quick lunch or dinner this is the place you're looking for. The waitstaff is also pretty nice too.

ozku3sSeIgPiXQQuaWprCg.text: Service was lacking. Not sure if it was due to it being after midnight. But we had to keep flagging down the bartender when we needed something. The place was nice and I will come back and give it another chance. However if I get poor customer service again I will not return.

9kSeEy9bDtQJyPn9aVtKCw.text: I had the pleasure of eating at Boardwalk Billy's with my dad a few days ago, and man I can honestly say that the food and atmosphere is top notch!!! He got the Nacho and Wings, and I kept it simple with the BFW (Burgers Fries Wings, subs the fries for their incredible Mashed potatoes!!!!). We love the fact that the restaurant is right by the water, yet so close to UNC Charlotte. We were extremely impressed with the service by our waiter, Mike Sherrard. The guy has this whole serving thing down! He treated myself and my dad with a lot of respect, and we can truly say that we would go back just to see Mike! Great beer prices. Food is delicious. Must go!!!

m0VPSR-6e8eZ-87olXcXaA.text: Recently visited and received terrible from both wait staff and manger. The food was dissatisfactory and poorly put together. Extremely confrontational bar staff will not not be going back.

NVlJSZVhZczczMIX21qb6A.text: I visited this establishment with a group for lunch and we seated fairly quickly. Our waiter Lindsey was very attentive, nice and had a good personality. I decided on the Grilled Shrimp Tacos and I am glad that I did because they were very flavorful. The only complaint about the tacos is I wish that I had more instead of two. I also had the macaroni and cheese and it was okay but I've had better. My friend let me try one of his Smokehouse Wings with Thai Chili sauce and they were very good. Overall, I enjoyed myself and would visit this establishment again.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Smokehouse Wings with Thai Chili Sauce. Fries and Macaroni and Cheese.
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Grilled Shrimp Tacos and Macaroni and Cheese.
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Grilled Shrimp Tacos and Macaroni and Cheese.

okCFdSZaJfJpGBrd1w3oSw.text: This was my first time coming here although I come to Charlotte often! We were looking for a place to go & have drinks not too far from our hotel! Although we didn't eat, we enjoyed the atmosphere! The live band was amazing! The crowd was nice being that there was a football game on. Our waiter was friendly and constantly made sure we were okay. I had the Coronita Rita & it was delicious! We look forward to coming back and tasting the food!

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

mxMI6ahS06l4XzPohQEnyw.text: Oh how I love Boardwalk Billy's especially in the University Area due to the beautiful view of the boardwalk and water. Let's get into the food. I have not ordered anything from Boardwalk that I haven't enjoyed. Not only do they have great drink specials daily, the food is prompt and a good size plate for the price. On Thursday's and especially evenings you can expect the College Students hanging out at the bar. Boardwalk is good for kids and adults.

IRDZsI5jfddlBTgY-WDCNg.text: Food, drinks and service were sub-par.  I ordered a honey Bee to drink which was good but weak. The Southern Nachos were just ok. 4 little chunks of brisket was laughable. It took almost 70min for the steampot to come out, that was so basic no seasoning, oysters were over cooked and dried out. It took them another 25 min just to check out.  I really had high hopes for this place.

g719Zd0tOaYH00rxYG2jYg.text: Sat at the bar tonight.  Lyndsey and Adam were the bartenders.  The margaritas and crab legs were delicious.  The service was outstanding!  I can always count on Boardwalk Billy's for good food, good drinks and a good time!   Nancy Bouldin Cochran  Greenville, MC

K1Eq-C_vkaw7iQjmgdlLgg.text: Boardwalk Billy's is consistently good. We come here often because our kids like it and we are addicted to the hushpuppies. The service is pretty good here. They are well staffed and if you do have to wait for a table it moves pretty quick. We ordered the crab dip and the turkey burgers, they both were good. We will definitely be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

XET7z0xWSVr3pgfbwprCEQ.text: Service at the Bar is poor. I ate at the bar twice both times terrible service. The waitress need more training in good customer service. Finally got the Bartender to notice me in order to place my order, and was told just a minute. I already was sitting there awhile waiting to get her attention to place my order. I just got up and left without ordering. To bad because I really like the food.

DovSxQew7jm-rk5KFzEz4w.text: Food was 3. Service 2.  I'll start from the beginning. It took about 20 minutes to be seated although we saw many empty tables. Another 10 minutes before a waitress took our drink orders and we ordered an appetizer. 30 minutes later the manager shows up saying the app was way behind but we'd get it free, cool. We appreciate that. However, another 30 minutes to get food and nobody bothers to check on us. All three burgers come out well done we all ordered medium.  So, we got average food, lousy service, and about 90 minutes from the time we entered until we were served our food.  Pretty upsetting.

u5KgdbvAFyaHqmL3_EYSog.text: I mean, you know what you're getting into when you come here... Way overcrowded and overpriced for the underwhelming quality of food you're going to get. I'll have a couple beers at the bar but never stay for dinner because it's just not worth it. The staff is typically slow and unfriendly, and this place has really just become a trap for college students and unsuspecting business travelers who make the mistake of staying in the University area.

WGtQWfx1nwsgjLWnIUoV5g.text: Decided to go out with a group of about 15 people after a work training course. Before we arrived we asked if we could all be seated together and they told us it wouldn't be a problem but upon arriving to the restaurant they told us that they couldn't accommodate us. So 5 of us were seated across the restaurant in a booth. We were annoyed that we couldn't sit near or even talk to the rest of our colleagues but we decided to just deal with it. Once we got our bills, we noticed that we were charged an 18% gratuity for being in a large group when we didn't even sit by them, order food at the same time, or leave at the same time. Supposedly the manager could not take the mandatory 18% gratuity fee for service that was already sub par. Very disappointed in my experience here and I will not be recommending this place to other colleagues that visit the area.

KXoKYquudYpMHGyIp09MbQ.text: Food was great, service was even better. The waiter never let my drink get under half. We had a party of 10 tonight and he was well taken care of. First I started with the cheese fries and they were absolutely amazing and very cheesy like I like it then I had the ribs and they were fall off the bone and tasted amazing. Another popular dish was a side item of collard greens and they were great. Overall this place is really good and I recommend you give it a try. The vibe of this place is really homie but also fashionable at the same time.

USjdrXS-zttD5PxwKAO8hA.text: I had the pleasure of eating dinner with my friend tonight and Kyle was our server. He did an AMAZING job. He was so vibrant . We really enjoyed his great customer service skills as wells as being easy going . A nice way to wrap up a Tuesday night . Kyle deserves a raise or 2!

mBuEz2jo9xwC7zEeauuQLQ.text: I always love going here to eat.  They have a large selection with a little something for everyone.  I love the atmosphere with the view of the lake.  It's a great place to go with the family for a nice meal or to hang out with friends.

boa7uK8X-xxAPnd9mJ6ntw.text: First visit to Boardwalk Billy's. Restaurant was very clean, staff was friendly and service was great.   I ordered dozen wings.  Menu said "voted the best in Charlotte."  Better recount the votes.  They were small and overlooked. Will try something else next visit.

rmKbIRBDcmKxFO1pK-4kog.text: My first time at Boardwalk Billy's and can say I will be back. Had the shrimp tacos recommended by my server Simone. Gotta try the brisket next time!

ZTp0--qOGMO7vQnVU__IeA.text: I've been here a few times and it's always a decent experience.  Nothing to race about but nothing to complain about either.  Pricing is reasonable and menu is broad enough for most palates.  Stand outs for me are their Mojitos and peel-and-eat shrimp. Their burgers are tasty but a little smaller than I expected. I go for the ability to sit by the water but also know that I can get consistently average food.

8t1xCxDVUbG_xh1yLVgE7g.text: Food was dry to me and I found it very inconvenient that you can only place to go orders through the app. Will not be going back any time soon.

5L21-IN-Wn5iwgs_PK3Txw.text: This is my second time here. I ordered the big bash both times. This is my new fave spot in Charlotte. The service was good. The food was fresh & delicious. I would suggest asking for old bay seasoning on the side if you order steamed seafood. The crab cakes were very crabby which was good. The crab queso was also delicious. I don't drink alcohol but they do have a ton of drinks that look amazing. I would definitely recommend this place & will bring any visiting family or friends there as well.

20MMVIbm9vmkY50AdF0s3w.text: There is a completely unnecessary cover charge here Friday and Saturday nights, and the bouncers are really rude.  After being especially abrasive with my friends and I, the bouncer walked back in, rubbed up against my friend and then grabbed her wrist to "check if she had her wrist band," and then when I told him to take his hands off of her, he told me "you better watch out."  I've been here before on weekdays and for lunch on weekends and it was okay. Probably this just isn't the place you want to hang out at on a weekend or for any special event.

dXSyIAMnVIm5v51hxui5xw.text: Great menu selection. Food is always good. There is a long wait at times but the food and drinks are worth it. I would highly recommend this place for an after work unwind meal, or a get together, or if you just don't feel like cooking. Regardless the reason, this place is a great choice. Overall, the staff is friendly and attentive. Oh yea..the atmosphere...awesome-sause

CYNnvIPLP40PrXUWy7u2YA.text: Overall great experience! Caleb Register was a very attentive and helpful server. Will be coming back for more!

xq1iB_9Rv0wqOtxJt3EFaQ.text: Visited Sunday night with a few friends to watch the basketball game and we had a blast. Our server Mike was amazing and hilarious. He made sure our drinks were always full and the food came out fast despite being so busy. We'll definitely be back.

a2eu8bOBdiQ1L4QoERWvvQ.text: This was my first time coming here. I realllly loved this place. The atmosphere is great, bar staff was friendly. Food was great!

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Buckets for 2!!! Sun Fish &amp; Crystal Ball
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. 2 orders of &#34;BFF&#39;s&#34; Burger Fries and Fingers!!!!

hCWpP-laDKJ3gv5rQJDHMQ.text: Boardwalk Billys has been a landmark for me as a UNC Charlotte Alum for quite sometime. Used to come here pretty regularly as a student and the drink specials were always good for a guy trying to scrunge-by on nickel and dimes.   Now-a-days, as it still close to "the office" I find myself wandering in here now and then for lunch. Now, the food was never bad before, but for whatever reason I never really ate here. But in any case, I was fairly impressed with the quality of what I ordered- Jerk Chicken Pita. It really hit the spot. Others at my table also had pretty decent meals off their lunch special menu. It is definitely worth coming out for a trail run of this place.  The atmosphere is great, nice interior with large bar. It is right on the man-made lake area and has an outside deck that protrudes the water. Great for nice weather days/ nights.   I'd imagine they still have local talent come out on the weekends, playing covers of decent songs. Drink specials have probably increased with the times since I've drank here, but I'd assume they are still competetive.

G2Wn5rraOjf4-QiksxwwlA.text: The buffalo wings tasted dry....  Their mashed potato and gravy tasted old. The crab cakes was good except presentation sucked for $13.99.  The waitress was decent so that made up for it.  I'm not super impressed with this place, but I am willing to give it another try. Just not during dinner time

Jc_-7t2nDSsDLnd1v-UD4Q.text: After my last experience here, I will NEVER go to this restaurant again. The service was awful and I have never left a restaurant feeling more disrespected and offended. I won't go into detail about what happened but just know that over the past few years I have frequented this restaurant with friends and even brought visiting guests to this place - so for me to say I will never go back is a big deal. This place obviously does not care about preserving its customer base whatsoever.The worst part is that I wish I had this experience sooner so that I could have stopped going here sooner and they wouldn't have gotten as much of my money as they did. Hopefully they will get better management and make some serious changes at this place.

iDTMT1esepLfk6z2Z-MaCw.text: One star is one too many. We will never go back. Our greeting was not, "Welcome to Billy's." Instead, these out-of-towners were told, "Show us four valid North Carolina IDs." No smile, no friendliness. Just an incredibly rude greeting. I can't imagine service any worse than this anywhere.

39iPpzEtq8Dj6aEKo9601w.text: Walk up and they ask for ID in a very abrupt, uber-bouncer way. Must be 21 to eat here. This family of 4 with minors left immediately. RUDE.

zJGCgRMvk3zaiK0Cj2aX_Q.text: Crab Queso and a cold beer and some vodka on special has always been my go to thursday night at the boardwalk.. great attentive staff with a great vibe.  Super huge resturant/bar with seafood avail!! Lots of great seafood. I love the boardwalk

nBgI36csKJhry0hQTOU8Pg.text: My first time in Charlotte, NC and I was there on business. My colleague and I decided on this place because it was near the hotel we were staying at. We had dinner here around 8pm on a tuesday, and it was sad to see how dead the area looked, even though it was a nice scenic view.   We shared the "Southern Nachos" that had smoked pulled pork, cheddar jack cheese, pico de gallo with cilantro lime sour cream sauce drizzled over the top. And of course, I added jalapenos.  This plate was soo huge, even for the two of us. I definitely recommend sharing with at least 4 people, otherwise, by the time your entree gets there you've filled up on nachos. Nothing wrong with that, but you'll miss out on the fabulous BBQ.   For my entree, I ordered the "Q Combo" which allows you to choose from their 2 or 3 smoked delights & two mouthwatering sides. I chose the link of smoked sausage and the 4 bone mini-rack. The sausage was good but not memorable. The mini ribs were fall off the bone which is great however it was lacking in flavors. I needed to drench it in bbq and hot sauce.   Overall, I thought it was a great casual place for the family.

jXjx9Q_acKT61chRA_Oqcg.text: I came here yesterday and sat at the bar with my boyfriend. The girl bartender who's pregnant kept giving me and my boyfriend dirty looks all night, we had a total of 5 drinks (me) and 6 drinks (my bf). We were there since 10pm so we had a drink per hour until about 12am when we had two drinks. We also had one shot each and bought some for the band that was playing (amazing group!!!). The pregnant bartender then decided to grab all the other girls that were bar tending and started talking about me and my boyfriend in front of us. I guess she "thought" we had too much to drink since I was laughing with my boyfriend. There were other much drunker people around. My advice is if you go there and she's bar tending just sit somewhere else, she gives horrible service and I will not be coming back after that.

hzU_XA-Hky47BukkJevvrw.text: My son and I were in Charlotte for the Nascar race and stayed at the Hilton nearby. Of course the south is known for great BBQ and this place was close and had good reviews so I was anxious to have some great food. We are from Portland Oregon, a foodie "mecca" these days and it seems our food rating scale is a lot different than here as this food was not very good. It was just okay at best. If this is what you are used to, that's fine but all the food we had in Charlotte was bland and uninspired. In Portland we have better BBQ.

wtP-6OR_qxEoXGpG6XcTzg.text: Fried green tomatoes, low country boil, crab queso, and really great sweet potato fries! Service was quick, friendly, and helpful. Priced reasonably, smaller meals offered, generous portions all the same.

td8ifS8hIhNQ3Mrv-YjPuQ.text: Every time I come here the food is great and the drinks can be cheap if you get what's on special- however the bouncers are total a-holes! So I don't think I'll be returning anytime soon even though I love the atmosphere once I'm inside...

QXj39HVJXIfaUDcckg2AFA.text: The buffalo chicken wrap was bland and kind of grody. The fries were barely acceptable and tasted like they were fried in week-old grease. Not impressed.

RfE7zJebZDRrwVYKckvTpg.text: I've been going here for a long time. Great staff. Wonderful food. Sweet atmosphere. You can always meet new and interesting people and eat real good food. Check it out.

aJaZlvSSGI1_zvcOF1cdYw.text: This place is right around the corner from my sister's place so both of the past 2 times I've visited we've stopped in.  Apparently it's a great local spot!    Lunch there in the spring was good.  I had a fish sandwich and we enjoyed sitting outside near the boardwalk.  What a nice feature!  Good service, good food, and good times.  Someone else tried the fried pickles and someone else enjoyed the fries.    Last weekend my sister, Mom, and some friends stopped by for late night drinks and snacks.  Great drink specials!  I enjoyed $6 Grey Goose and Cran drinks and the others enjoyed a few beer specials.  Mom ordered a grilled chicken sandwich and subbed steamed veggies for fries.  Not bad for 10pm!  I ordered 6 steamed oysters.  $7.99 was definitely steep for me in terms of pricing, but I really wanted them and thankfully they didn't disappoint!  Others ordered sandwiches with fries and all said the fries were terrible -- my sister's were barely cooked....so no-go on those.  Sad.  Service was good though.  We never felt "abandoned" as you do in some bars, but were taken care of very well.  Open mic night was also going on which we enjoyed.  We'll probably hit it up again next time we're in town since my sis and her friends enjoy it so much.

Bm8VDvnYZZonUKPGPA0YIA.text: Went there for the first time yesterday. Great place and really good drinks. Brianna was our hostess and she was fantastic. Very attentive in spite of it being a busy night. Definitely going back there.

37jxQIFjll7X_ll4GyviOg.text: Crab legs were great but the service was typical college bar style. Could have been better for the price. Good beer selection though!  I would come again.

Pzfgp-27xFLdVV3eRZRGIQ.text: Apparently this place is run by a bunch of comedians.  Last night when walking in I was asked for ID.  I am 60.  I had left my wallet in the hotel.  I explained I was British and didn't have to bother with that sort of thing. Nice bouncer with a sense of humour let me in and I enjoyed my meal and a few beers.  Why they gave me a wrist band when I wasn't in hospital eludes me.  Tonight I wander across again and am asked for a $5 cover.  None last night but $5 tonight.  I explained that all I wanted was something to eat although I did fancy a few beers as well. Ok. Says my nice bouncer friend who recognised me from last night. Go on in but you will have to get it to go.  Being a cheeky little 60 year old I snuck a beer whilst my food was prepared.  There were twice as many seats as the previous night and the 6 bartenders were serving no one.  My food arrived and I left.  Tastes good but no beer. My question to the manager or owner is who came up with this?    2 additional comments.  1 There was no live music playing which could have possibly justified the cover and  2. Why was o not ID'd tonight. Had North Carolina overnight declared it legal for 60 year olds to drink in its bars.  Had common sense prevailed   I wait with baited breath for an answer.!

wDpqlsXMoKng0rlo5hFSpQ.text: Nice sports bar atmosphere with good barbecue. Laid back bartenders were attentive and pleasant. Good draught beer selection at reasonable prices. Several TVs throughout. I thoroughly enjoyed the perfect pulled pork, all but falling off the bone ribs and added a crabcake.  Sides were excellent fried green tomatoes and okay slaw. Too much food? Yes. I especially liked that there were 4 distinctly different sauces for the smoked meats. Eastern (more vinegar), Western (tomato based) and South (strong mustard influence). I eschewed the Sweet & Sassy as it's generally not for me.  The setting is great with an outdoor patio (too cold tonite)overlooking a nice pond. All in all - a bodacious dinner for me.  I will add that the prices are very kind to the wallet.

hIMiydZg9LFk3mCTILi32Q.text: The waiter was good but the management sucked ass..... My friend got a alcoholic drink that was not good and tasted like water and the manager proceeded to say my bartender has been working here for years and know what he is doing and we know all sells are final but he did not want to make anything better and proceeded to argue with us about the drink and would not do anything to make up for the drink!!!!! I WILL NEVER GO TO THIS PLACE AGAIN!!!  Then to top it off the food isn't all that either!! Anyone could make the food at home that they are selling! IF I COULD HONESTLY RATE IT, IT WOULD GET A ZERO!

iJyeq-yjorx2yCjiSYXuSQ.text: Food poisoning.....I had a order of the crablegs and corn and within a hour of eating it i was throwing up and had horrible stomach pains. Do not recommend

RqHryRtVf_coASIgR4mhLw.text: Great food and even a more reasonable price. If you need a suggestion for an appetizer get the crab con queso . Add a lil on my burger. Will never eat burgers the same way again.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

O7pwTrkC-xUQUlRi0OVqCw.text: I don't know what took me so long to try this place. I enjoy the ultimate pot, which includes crab legs, clams, shrimp and potatoes. If you don't like something in the pot you can choose something else. You can also add sausage and it'll taste like a True crab boil. I don't eat clams so I get more crab legs. I also love their crab con queso.

nvKOeq_TcUeSvE3c9eCIZQ.text: First time visit. Great bar atmosphere with nice patio. Was too hot to sit outside but inside was nice  definitely looked like it would be a great place to hangout on the weekend. Food was hit or miss. Had the smoked meat combo. Pulled pork was really good. Tasty and nice size serving. The ribs were awful. Dry like shoe leather. And yet a bit fatty as well. Maybe they were left over from day before.  Hush puppies were excellent.  Overall I'd try it again and see if the seafood is better than the meat.

j3TjDBI7yovpVwe0Z8z7Zg.text: Went to board walks today for a few beers with some friends. Hunter was wonderful and very attentive. He never left a drink filled. He knew what beers we'd like and gave us good recommendations for food.Definitely will be back!

ynavj2DW9GOl7tsDZNE7Pw.text: I love these bartenders, the food, the drinks, and the management. And whoever manages the FB page is hilarious and keeps it real. Check it out.

E2SR9Jhw1qisV9P_kWqUNg.text: Good quick place for some great American food. Got amazing service from our waitress Olivia and the runners. Definitely will be coming back soon

wj2h80XUMVBw7_5Ahm4-_w.text: It was a nice place, great for a date night of that sort or just a good hang out spot. The drinks were mixed just right the food was nice and hot..no complaints.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

j3Y7TavAsntkwlita26eYA.text: A glance at other reviews shows that quite a few people haven't received good service here at Billy's. After trying to go in one night and being stopped for ID and cover charge, I decided I would only return during the day. I have been twice, both times mid afternoon and thankfully never had an issue with service. So far I've only tried their burgers, fries, wings, and crab cakes. Normal bar food but it hits the spot every time.  Looking out at the water and the ducks in the lake from the patio is always a pleasant experience.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Crab cakes
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

dPldwTfF-5O3uoKpkCFsiQ.text: One of my all time favorite places in Charlotte. I moved here not too long ago for work. My family and I ate here one of the first nights to celebrate the move being complete. Now whenever I have visitors, it will definitely be a place I will suggest we go and eat! You can go here with anybody, the atmosphere is great. We went on a Friday night and we had a 30 minute wait, but it was definitely worth it. You know it's a great place when they have courtesy peanuts to snack on! I got the smokehouse wings and they were phenomenal. One of the cool things about going out to eat is everyone can get something different so we can try many options! I highly recommend giving it a try!

u3lw4X5tYYAydfbtrOyqAQ.text: My 2 star is literally only for the one dish I ordered which was the seafood boil. Was supposed to be boiled in a butter garlic type sauce but it was just flavorless water. I paid 2 dollars extra for flavorless sausage slices. It came with 3 oysters, which I'm not sure why because I could eaten each one with a toothpick since there was literally no oyster in the shell. We also ordered the crab con queso dip which was what I can only assume to be a melted chunk of velvita with crab chunks in it. My wife ordered the shrimp tacos which were pretty good which is why I was so disappointed that my boil was so bland. I'm sure the actual meat they serve like the brisket etc is probably really good. So the next time I go back I will stay clear of the rawbar menu.

nieabIicUlXC7t9r3hUpOg.text: I put off going to Boardwalk Billy's for a long time. We purchased a Groupon last March, but it didn't expire until this April, so we've been pushing it back in order to use other Groupons that expired sooner. Now with April fast approaching it was finally time to see what ol' Billy had to offer.  Boardwalk Billy's is located in that...boardwalk-esque area set up in the University area. It is a nice location being right near the water, and there is plenty of space to wander around in order to walk off your meal and drinks. There were some nice outdoor seating options but it was a tad too chilly to do that, so we ate inside. I was surprised to find there was a fifteen minute wait at 6:00 on a Saturday, simply because this was one of the first times we've had a wait at a restaurant since moving down here. It ended up being shorter, and we were eventually sat.  Boardwalk Billy's offers the tableside peanuts so you are encouraged to chuck your shells on the floor. We partook of the nuts (keeping our mess in a neat pile on the table) while perusing the beer menu. There were probably close to twenty beers on draft to choose from, and most were either local or national microbrews, which is always refreshing to see. I went with NoDa's Hope Stout ($4) and the missus had the Big Boss Countess ($4.) After the beer arrived we placed our dinner orders, and it arrived shortly after. The menu is pretty solid, with choices ranging from BBQ to seafood to plain ol' sandwiches and burgers.   First thing I want to mention is that Boardwalk Billy's looks like your typical bar/hangout spot. What I didn't expect was to find the food was far better than what you would expect at such a place. I ordered the four bone rack of ribs ($9.99) and they were some of the best I've had down here. The ribs were not heavily sauced so you got more of the smoke and natural pork flavor, which was awesome. There was also a nice "crust" on the exterior of the ribs, and that bark was nice and crispy while the meat underneath was succulent, moist and flavorful. For the sides I ordered a salad ($1.50 upcharge) with balsamic dressing and mac & cheese. The mac & cheese was not the best, but not the worst. The consistency and texture were spot on, but the flavor was a bit lacking and mild. On the other hand, the salad was the star and totally worth the upcharge. This wasn't a cheese side salad...this was a real salad. It comes in a huge bowl and had some mixed greens, diced tomatoes, carrot slices, crispy croutons and...BACON!!!!!! I would never expect to get bacon as a component of a side salad, yet it was there and it was chewy and flavorful and plentiful. They definitely didn't skip with the cured pork and it made the salad totally worth it.   The missus ordered the shrimp tacos ($9.99) and they were pretty scrumptious. It came with two big soft shell tacos full of shrimp mango and pico. The shrimp were cooked perfectly and the overall flavor was downright tastetacular. As a side she ordered the fried green tomatoes, and these things were crazy good! I don't like tomatoes but I had to try a fried green, and boy am I glad I did. A side comes with four huge slices that are battered and deep fried and served with a tasty sauce. The green tomatoes are so thick and firm that I didn't get that nasty mushy feeling I get from regular tomatoes, and the batter coating was great. The dipping sauce was a touch spicy and complimented the tomato very well. I ended up stealing two of her tomatoes because they were so darn good!  Don't let the look of the place fool you...they know how to cook and serve great food. Sure you can come here for a beer and bar grub, but it's done better than your average bar would do it. The BBQ is some of the best I've had in the area, and I'm surprised to find myself valuing their BBQ over other places I've been to that specialize in nothing but the 'Q. If you don't mind the loud noise and crowds I'd definitely recommend giving this place a visit. I definitely know we will be back!

DQ-bo2e5VOUtWRWl5qcqRQ.text: We walked to the entrance where a young woman was standing she informed us it would be about 30 minutes for our table of two to be seated. She was very delightful. They notified us about 15 minutes later. We walked in to the hostess she was busy talking and about a minute later she asked our name. She seated us we wait another three minutes for another young female to come over she walks up and asked our drink order. No hi my name is or anything. She brings us our drinks then walks off comes back five minutes later. You guys ready to order. Oh ok we place the order and she just walks off twirling in her hair. She didn't repeat the order or anything. About 20 minutes later another server comes and gives us our food. The burgers and fries were good and flavorful. The only reason it received two stars was because the food was really good. The service sucked for this to be our first time here. We'll try it again hopefully we won't get the same server.

_-_8h1fKuYnSyFngxIhSQA.text: My husband and I used to hang out here way back when we went to UNCC (about 1.2 million years ago if you ask my kids). We didn't go for the food then & after our dining experience last night I assume most of their customers feel the same way. The bar scene is lively & they have great drink specials. However, we actually went to eat dinner last night with our kids. The waitress was friendly and attentive. The food was lackluster. My pulled chicken sandwich had 2 bones in it. The fries were greasy & didn't seem very fresh. The kids macaroni was so dry it looked and tasted like it had been sitting under the heat for hours. If we go back here it will be to sit at the bar for drinks.

PPNsk08am3EXrcGPeLy8og.text: If I based the review on the oysters, beer selection, and service I would be giving a 5. The oysters were great, somehow they were some of the best oysters I have had. However the ultimate steam pot was a little disapointing, small amount of crab legs and only a handfull of shrimp and mussels but a ton of potatoes. But it was only $16.99. I had 2 beers a dozen oysters and the steam pot for $41, not bad at all.  7/13/2010  Visited again today for a dozen oysters. Some how they were better than yesterday. Today they were huge and outstanding.

frkGUncSfqbFeH-Xh9g52g.text: What can I say that will begin to pay homage to the feelings I have in my heart for the bar that raised me from a novice drinker to the raging alcoholic I am today?  I love you Boardwalk Billy's, and I'm not ashamed to share my Top 7.5 reasons why:  1. If I've had a bad day, I can always count on killer drink specials to enchant my evening.   2. Crab Con Queso.  I'm salivating at the thought. 3. There's always an interesting mix of people gathered at the bar, mostly mouthy, but usually very friendly. 4. The atmospheric conditions are always favorable to me drinking A LOT of beer, especially on the patio.  5. I've hosted baby showers, going away parties, birthdays, etc. in the private room overlooking the lake. Beautiful setting. 6. Ian and Sasha, two of the best bartenders in the city. 7. If you're a single lady, you'll love the ratio. 7.5 Hello, Beautiful College Boys....

tr35Hxw0G3GIC0xGZ51jWA.text: This place always has great food and great drink specials! It caters mostly to the younger crowd, but you can still take your family here for a great meal during earlier hours. The only complaint I have about this place is the peanut shells all over the floor. It grosses me out a bit to step on them as I'm making my way around the bar. Other than the peanut shells this is a great place to have a drink and watch the game with some friends.

Billys is in a great location, but isn't anything special. It's just a fun spot to have drinks and be merry with friends.   On Monday, they had $4 washington apple shots, and $2 domestics. Sweet chili wings were a little better than the smoked ones.  Overall I am giving 2 starts because it took over 40 min to get our food.

BbC5JD-sTYNdmPSaNni_-Q.text: Fantastic service, Clint's a good man! He takes care of us every time, he has a very warm personality.

EfGEVxcn1MEamqxCzkrU8w.text: Under the Boardwalk we'll be having some FUN! Under the Boardwalk.. BOARDWALK !    Boardwalk Billy's truly has become a staple in the University area, as well as on the UNC Charlotte scene. The laid back atmosphere and sociable staff always make my trips to Boardwalks the most enjoyable. The restaurant and bar space is extremely functional. There's ample space to move about and people watch as you grab a bite to eat or a quick drink with friends. Speaking of food while you're here do yourself a flavor and try the Buffalo Wings. Your tummy and taste buds will thank you. And if you so happen to have a taste for a spirited drink, Boardwalk's has daily drink specials. My favorite special is the Thursday night special. You and your friends can enjoy "$2 U Call Its" while listening to some upbeat mixes from the house DJ. And if you're lucky, you and your friends might catch a glimpse of the local "smooth criminal"  (a Michael Jackson impressionist). And what could be more fun than great food, good drinks, and a show?!  So grab some friends and make your way to Boardwalk Billy's for some food and fun.

m6P2QWiBCY4rxf-BlgHTvw.text: Love this place. I am a regular here and the place always has friendly staff. The food is pretty decent depending on what you get. You can't go wrong with the seafood here. You get a pretty diverse crowd too which makes for good people watching. The patio is nice too when the weather is nice. I highly recommend this place. A++

VEoloHtR3olqcJeFSVZ-BA.text: To get the right feel for this place, think TGI Fridays meets your typical sports bar.    On a Tuesday afternoon this place was fairly crowded with the undergrad crowd from UNC.  There are plenty of big screen tvs showing sports which can be viewed from almost every seat in the place.  There is an outdoor section which overlooks the stream.  It seems nice but the geese might make it a little more trouble than it is worth.    The food is what you would expect from a sports bar.  The portions are huge.  Don't be afraid to select the half-orders, you will receive plenty of food.  The staff is very friendly in a Southern charm sort of way.    Be careful walking in because they serve peanuts in the shell in baskets to each table.  The custom is to chuck the peanut shells onto the floor while a staff member pushes a broom around the establishment.    Oh yeah, be warned this isn't California.  I looked at this rectangular object on the table and it actually took me a minute to mentally register that it was an ashtray.  People smoke still inside restaurants here.

uGypkBTZZ5eYYWzqislt4Q.text: Laid back atmosphere. Staff is very friendly. Great drink specials! Food is good, my personal favorites are crab queso, shrimp tacos, Boardwalk salad, and the smoking section is so delicious my mouth is watering now just thinking about it. I've been several times and never been disappointed. Almost everything they make is homemade from the desserts to the dressings, even the BBQ sauces that sit on the table. If your visiting Charlotte this place is a must visit! Ps the beer selection is huge and very diverse, my personal favorite is big boss high roller.

rEVCumBgVdUfZKet268gBg.text: The best thing on this menu is the hot peel and eat shrimp. The service here is horrendous! It seems that the wait staff receives no training. I've been here a few times and it's always the same. The staff runs around like a chicken with their heads cut off. The food is standard bbq fare and that about it. Expect to wait a while before you get your drinks and food.

9HXvxgO1jFBvkhIfZ7tGOg.text: During my UNCC days Boardwalks was definitely the local watering hole.  I have recently revisited this past Sunday.  Staff is still friendly, food is good.  I was pleased to see they added fried pickles, which I did not remember from before.  Beer was cold and has a good atmosphere being right by the water.  This place is great, I would not go there at night with the college crowd.

kpQdoYWxdmym1WDAHNAtVA.text: The nicest place around. Great seafood and atmosphere. Bartenders do an excellent job keeping your drinks full too. I will definitely be returning!

_8IBi7tEYnpsW960m-pXeg.text: I highly recommend Boardwalk Billy's for anyone who wants good beer and great food. The crab dip is incredible and our server Jack was very knowledge about their beer selection. Cheers!

TkkuVFsUqf_B_CcPTrJcMA.text: Very disappointed. Will not go back. We used to go all the time. Ordered the crab dip, imitation crab... at a raw bar that serves crab?! And they charge you $11 for a small pile of chip and cheap cheese.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Imitation crab in the crab dip... at a RAW BAR?! And you&#39;re going to pay $11 for it! At least the beer was cold and the peanuts were good.

gxOxBMtwIiXDn_zFiGbwOQ.text: My friend & I ate dinner here on 6/26/19, we sat outside near the front door. We were immediately met with gnats... We ordered drinks, Very Berry Lemonade & a Makers Mark with tea. The Very Berry Lemonade tasted just like cough syrup, after informing me the alcohol drinks were final sale, the waitress offered to sweeten the drink. She did that & it still tasted the same even after adding more sweetener. We ordered the crab queso dip, the seafood boil & peel n eat shrimp (steamed). The dip was good but the crab meat was imitation which I didn't know until we had eaten over half the dip as all the crab meat was at the bottom. The seafood boil & shrimp were good except for the fact there were over half of the shrimp that hadn't been properly cleaned & de veined completely. After noticing this we cute most of the shrimp we could eat in half as the bottom half wasn't clean.   I do feel as if the alcohol sales are final that should be printed on the drink menu (not sure if is or not as I didn't pay attention to that). Most restaurants allow you to change drinks as you're replacing the drink you don't want with something you do want.  The gnat situation affected another table outside as well as they were too waving their hands & arms to get the gnats away. Not sure if you guys spray for that but that needs to be done. I've sat on the backside of the restaurant a week before & there was no gnat problem at all. If you're offering a crab queso did there should be real crab meet & not imitation crab meat especially coming from a seafood restaurant. I will return for drinks but will not order anything off the drink menu instead I will order drinks I've drank in the past at home (whiskey & coke/ginger ale. The updated menu is better than the old menu so that was a good upgrade.

EDz5-2_w1Z3Av-3lduw25Q.text: This place is great for college kids. I was once one and if I went to college here I would go here every night! They have wonderful specials on drinks. There is so much space. Their food is just bar food. Nothing spectacular. It's great for late night since there are like NO late night spots in Charlotte.

CL3PVH8xRd4a3vjc18l1pA.text: Boardwalk Billy's always seems to be lively, with a good amount of people there, great outdoor seating, and a view overlooking the water. Because of this my fiance and I decided to try it here. Overall I was unimpressed. For the price the food and drinks were very average. I was hoping to love it here because it looks fun, but after coming I probably won't be back unless it's just for a beer or two.

HLHPC0UfFuMEZgXK5C9MjA.text: Ate here this past weekend. Was a very long wait but that was to be expected. Staff was nice and courteous. Once seated our waiter was prompt and nice also. I ordered the fried fish and shrimp plate with a side of fries. The shrimp was way too salty. The fish had way too much breading on it. They only gave you a small portion of fries. The coleslaw was decent. My date had the barbecue ribs. They were okay nothing spectacular. I probably will eat here again but try something different.

Z5SyAl5e85tL-XXCJUBQ8A.text: This place is right on the pond with beautiful views all over. Lots of glass, letting the daylight and reflection off the water into the restaurant.   I was staying at the Hilton, so it was super convenient to have dinner here. My coworkers picked this place and I thought it would be easy to find pescatarian options. I underestimated the south. Not wanting to get a plate of crab legs, my only other option was the shrimp tacos. Turns out they were really quite good! They were supposed to be spicy. I wouldn't bill them as spicy, but they had a decent taste to them. I opted for the broccoli side, which was good, but had salt sprinkled on it. No seasoning, just salt. Wasn't into salt on broccoli and was able to brush most of it off.   I'll consider going back, but due to the limited choices, probably only if I'm staying at the Hilton.

QJ5DVOGy8lxAazYEm8F7hA.text: Around 2:30 pm, me and a group of 12 friends decided to go out and eat here for our friends birthday. We informed our host that we wanted to sit outside and drink for the day. We were celebrating a good friend's birthday at a bar. We may have gotten loud at points. We were never asked by any staff to quiet down. After bringing out the ice cream and celebrating our friends birthday, we grabbed our checks immediately to leave and we were approached by a deputy on the patio to kick us out when we were just there to eat and celebrate. We were on our way out of the restaurant when the deputy showed up to ask us to leave. We were respectful, tipped 20%, our waiter Justin was amazing, but being approached by an officer was honestly the rudest and we won't be returning or giving our money to Boardwalk Billies again.

However, when we went to the host he said that they had held our table for an hour and we missed it, which was impossible because we had only arrived and put in our name in 20 minutes earlier. It had been a long day and one of my friends raised his voice upset about the situation. He did not swear or yell. He was just trying to understand what had happened. Next thing we know a bouncer, the manager and a sheriff come out. I have never been more embarrassed or shocked. We didn't talk to anyone else and just left. We won't be returning.

axI4AHtBusvG0pQSKAPluw.text: This place has outdoor seating right next to the water. The view is great. This place is located near a bunch of shops so we had a little wait but were able to walk around until our table was ready. The restaurant prices were reasonable. I had their oysters and their crab cakes. The oysters were nice and large and they came with all of the accompaniments. The crab cakes were 2 crab cakes each. And they were good as well

RTwzlUXgF0WGD_L5uaa1Pw.text: I and a few friends decided to go to Boardwalk Billy's University because 5hey had never been. While waiting for seats at the bar, I see an 'off the clock' bartender that has served me many times before. She grabs me, spilling her drink on another employee in the process.  After apologizing and removing myself from that situation, I go to order my FIRST drink of the night. The bartender cuts me off and says 'Oh no, I'm not serving you after that.' He tells me that he has informed the other bartender not to serve us as well.  When I ask for the manager, he comes out with an attitude and tells me it's a 'fee off the clock employees that are drunk and are the problem.'  After I tell him I've only been there for less than five minutes, he tells me I must be 'intoxicated on something and need to go.'  My friends, who have never been here before, get their tabs closed out and are told to leave as well. Their tabs were about six bucks each, and the intoxicated employees were all still there when we left.  I personally have come to Boardwalk Billy's often, even spending my 21st birthday there last year. It's likely to be the last one I spend as this was a terrible experience for myself and my friends.  I've never been treated like this in any restaurant/bar before, and I hope this doesn't happen to anyone again. Sticking up for an employee as a manager is one thing. Coming out with an attitude like that without the whole story is another. Very disappointing.

H8OPLueDs-oOtOHUITHfQA.text: Never being to Charlotte the location of the venue was attractive. My son and I shared a platter with crab legs, oysters, and shrimp.  The food was pretty good. I would recommend adding some old bay to the meal though. The atmosphere was good, and I enjoyed the multiple tvs for sports. We will visit again when we return to Charlotte.

C8dMqI_CctntRcwGsiXC2Q.text: Great experience, location and atmosphere. The food is fantastic and the area is great. Definitely a place to go for sports. The wings and seafood is amazing. Worth the time and trip

_Kyj5v-z59Rvdiw0Dwm7aw.text: Approached hostess to add name to waiting lists. She informed us it would be 30-40 minutes.  She took our names and told us they would text us when our table was ready. My family and I walked around the boardwalk for almost an hour and still hadn't receive a text. Went back to hostess stand, which had a different representative, and she said they already seated my party when obviously it wasn't my party. She acted like it wasn't anything big and said we would have to wait again. We could plainly see there were empty, cleaned off tables that they could have placed us at. It took another 10-15 minutes for them to text me that our table was ready. By that time, we were already on our way to another location.  They texted me three more times that my table was ready. Frustration comes from lack of professionalism and unwillingness to remove themselves from the stool they were perched upon to see if they could fix their mess up or inform management.

uBOcVRKgqtNORg6BNyBiMg.text: The food was great.  I wanted the Jamaican Jerk chicken but had to settle for the buffalo chicken wrap. At that point it was a disappointment for me.  My wife and daughter loved their meals.  Hopefully the next time they will not be out of jerk chicken.

2EdneWVLZ6PzFJl6kKIFRg.text: Boardwalk Billy's had great customer service yesterday night. We were seated immediately and our server, Devin was his name I believe, was very polite. We were initially sat at a wobbly table. Our server fixed that almost immediately. We then ordered fried green tomatoes and coconut shrimp for appetizers and they were delicious. The issue came when we ordered our entrees. We waited at least 45 minutes for ribs, jerk chicken, and salad just to be told that our ticket was lost in the kitchen. We were then told our order would be out ASAP but still waited an additional 10-15 minutes or so. The food was then subpar. My chicken was not well seasoned and was only warm as if it had been sitting. The ribs tasted as if they were baked but the salad was fine. Lol. How can you mess up a salad. We never heard from a manager to apologize or received a discounted price or anything. Devin did the best that he could but we won't be back here.

myW-QNo_drHhX29g_p6S2g.text: Great place to watch a game and enjoy their food and drinks. I highly suggest u try them out, the pond area is a little dirty but it's not their fault. They get my 5 stars!

S9i_m5ozxRkDBtr8nDwtkg.text: First timers to Boardwalk Billy's and we loved it. I ordered the honey bee cocktail from the bar and it was mixed perfectly! There's a variety of beers on tap. My boyfriend had the bell's 2 hearted on draft, but it was a little warm for a draft. For dinner, I had the coconut shrimp with fried green tomatoes. My boyfriend had the beer can chicken special and our daughter had the kids shrimp and hush puppies. All of our entree's were really good, definitely cleaned our plates. But the best part was our server Taylor! Phenomenal customer service. She was very upbeat, excited about the menu, and checked on us the entire meal from start to finish. So when you go to Boardwalk Billy's make sure to ask for Taylor, she is the best!

I6FJFVpAk1T4f86YhtzEKA.text: Celebrated my daughters 18th birthday here on Sunday and we had a wonderful time! Our waiter was very friendly and right on top of things even though it was just him and 18 of us and the food was excellent as well. Brooke the hostess was so sweet and courteous in making sure they would be able to serve such a large party...she went above a beyond, so glad to experience such good customer service...thank you!

E35xKBobk-OhcIIEeRFibw.text: Food, cold. Drinks watered down. Service, non existent. Down the street from the University, I guess this is reminiscent of a college bar... Not for grown folks!

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Watered down sangria... Refused to take care of the issue.... Won&#39;t be coming back

3-gUPjXH4W1TemBdlSn8-w.text: server needed help with our group of 15. a very large part was in the back room and they took a lot of attention from the staff. frustration was the look on faces at other tables. We were ok because we were talking and celebrating a friends bday.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Steam pot

mvR3NlEpT9mdm7Rfx9HkKQ.text: I have been to this restaurant on several occasions: late night after a country concert, Saturday afternoon to continue pregaming for a UNCC football game, and for rush events for the fraternity. Food is always delicious, and it's the only place around that I know of where you can get $6.00 personal pitchers of a draft beer. Friendly bar environment and definitely a place to be to watch the big game!

olh-iGdWB-hBiYp21Vubbw.text: I enjoy this restaurant and the surrounding area. Paddle boat on the lake, boardwalk, surrounded by multiple restaurants and stores..

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Smoked chicken nachos
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Smoked wings in mango sauce
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. House grape vodka and Yuengling beer, drink special

Na9spEsZslevIQcrtNB4jA.text: Abby aka Abigail was a rockstar, service was quick, food was great. First time here but definitely not last!!! Sweet Tea recipe is great, do not change it!!!

nNJEw_lPGMjws_uxle197w.text: The atmosphere and service was great! I loved how it was right on the lake. Very unique. I was here during the olympics, so seeing a different sport on every TV was awesome.   We came for appetizers and margaritas. We had the crab con queso and chicken fingers. Both were great. The crab con queso was some of the best I have had. I have had many cheese dips with crab that tasted fake, but this was rich and tasted fresh. The chips were crisp and fresh as well. The chicken fingers were skinny, but we loved them. I had ranch with them and it was some of the best ranch I have had at a restaurant.   The margaritas were pretty pricy ($11-15), but that is alcohol for you. It tasted good and it was a pretty good amount for the $. I will definitely be going back for $4 mimosas on Sundays!

n-mznqUWCgcPCo8qhFqovw.text: The food here was tasty and the servings were large. I ordered ribs with two sides and couldn't finish it. The atmosphere was good too. There was a live band that didn't seem to play much more than warmup riffs. After about 30 minutes, they did manage to play a couple of songs. Our waitress seemed a little overwhelmed. It took her a while to come and check on us after we received our food so we were without extra napkins, BBQ sauce and sweetener for our tea for a while. We never received refills until she came to ask if we were ready for the check. The cost was great though. Full meals for two and a crab cake basket with drinks for less than $60.

7ELzm2JIXGVW2vWReugEmA.text: The only good thing about eating here would be the view from the patio. I've eaten here a few times since I lived nearby. The service has never been spectacular and the food has never been above mediocre.

ORcfn6fafV5ugND7bQSjRw.text: I am not impressed. In short it's a great big beer bar. Wings weren't great. Menu & bar were sticky. Service was slow.

NvbOYjIfvS167z7MmdG_Rg.text: BF and I landed in Charlotte for business at 10pm on a Sunday and we were hungry once we checked into our hotel.  Room service was almost closed for the night so we went down to Boardwalk Billys since they were open til 2am.    They checked our ID at the door and gave us wristbands.  We figured this is a hot spot for the University students since UNCC is nearby.  But it was pretty dead on Sunday when we went.  Only the late night menu was available which included your typical bar food: wings, fries, nachos, and other munchies.   We went with wings, crab cakes, and fries since it was already getting late.  Really liked that they had a long list of sauces to pick from for the wings.  We tried the chipotle citrus, which was great with the chicken.   I'd definitely try to come back next time I'm in Charlotte to see this place crackin' and have a few drinks with dinner.  Also like that it's right on the man-made lake which provides a nice atmosphere.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Dead on a Sunday at 11pm
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Typical bar food on the late night menu

ChP3L4OpGHvh7KSe8yioAg.text: I am not in this town often but this place is a WIN-WIN! Great service, good food @ excellent prices! Very glad I went inside and left completely satisfied! Need a Boardwalk Billy's in New Jersey!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

iB4_XfqzHDe78B6k7rC8LQ.text: Cody Wade is an awesome waiter. He made our dinner so enjoyable and he really knew his stuff. Great food and service. Can't wait to come back.

yZ3RfNGJkmdWExk0IIIFDA.text: this place gets packed at night on any day. they actually charge you to get in. lol. didn't try any food just got some drinks. their drink specials are pretty good.

DEmYbxhWorHjKRg51yFOsA.text: I never write reviews about Restaurants. However there is a time to start. First off let me start by saying the wait staff was excellent. Now to why I am writing this review, my wife ordered a drink off of their drink menu, she took a sip and did not like it. So we asked the waiter if we could replace it with a different drink.  Unknown to us there is a policy that if you by a drink you have to keep the drink. So I asked to speak to the manager night. I told him that we would like to exchange the drink. He points to the menu that they have a no return policy on drinks ordered. (lol) Now call me old fashion but I have never been in any restaurants that had that policy. So I told him ok well since you are forcing me to buy the drink. We will pay for the drinks we had and the appetizers and we are leaving. He goes to get the bill and returns saying. "I did not know you place your order" you will have to pay for the order placed.  Now once again that is a new one. So I asked where is it written that I had to pay for food that is not bought to my table? He threaten to call the police because we were going to leave without paying for the food.  (lol) I said I am offering to pay for what I consumed. He couldn't answer the question about having to pay for the food. We were asked to leave and never come back.  What I don't understand is this, we ordered over $90.00 worth of food. However instead of reaching an agreement over an $8.00 drink you give up $90.00. I am surprised they are still in business. Wow what an unbelievable experience.  Sorry can't review the food since I never received the food.

bmpEtVnZW4BgLNfgIcAtDA.text: crappy customer service, drinks suck had to pay $5.00 to get in because it was saturday night and the live band didnt show up....

PCSD5AFGlF8hK2p_nga3Mg.text: It's a great place to spend a few hours hangout with friends watching any sporting event.  Most Saturdays you may catch a little live music too. The food and service is good.

DjnbxoCf_JGmmYNeHiZNdg.text: I went to eat here a few weeks ago and the very next day I became sick with the stomach bug. I also know a few others who have had food poisoning from eating here. I would not recommend coming here at all. I'll never go back! I had chicken tenders which were really small and my mashed potatoes weren't even mashed completely..

AnWiUiYseP37IOD7YJCBoA.text: Maybe it is because our hometown doesn't have good seafood (or at least any I've found), but we found the seafood at this restaurant to be utterly delightful.  It isn't cheap but most seafood isn't.  The shrimp were spiced on point and the rest of the meal was seasoned well.  I saw that they have live music later in the evening.  Looks like they do charge cover charges at times.  Might want to do call ahead seating or reservations and check on their specials.

68MCG-Gw3pKfL3ANTuiT0g.text: Nice menu selection.  During this visit we enjoyed the crab con queso, fried green tomatoes, the flounder platter and sandwich and a chicken Caesar salad.  Varied draft list with quite a bit of local selections.  Paul, our waiter was attentive and courteous.  The location is nice especially since its near the University.  Like that it has outdoor seating!

hRoDXijsQA-fNRWFrdalBA.text: Came on a Friday night expecting it to be busy and a wait. Put our name on the list and was told a half hour wait. Totally fine. Went to the bar for drinks while we waited on a table, bartenders are less than friendly. But hey, it was busy. We sit outside and 45 minutes pass by while we see several groups sit at available 5tops who put their name on the list after us. I got up to check on the table and hostess says they are just waiting for the table to be cleaned off. 5 more minutes pass and she buzzes us up and points to a table to tell us it's ready. We go to the table and it's still dirty, half of us awkwardly stand by the dirty table and a few sit at the dirty table and the poor busser girl comes and cleans the table around us. No menus for 5 minutes. Update as the meal went on* our server was mehh, barely came around the table and trying to get boxes and checks was a 15 minute wait long after we had finished eating.   I used to come here a lot. Just really disappointed in my visit tonight.

CIDn-m9_dhP0oshl3HUpYg.text: I personally enjoyed my experience. Had a bit of a wait, but I enjoyed my rum bucket or whatever it was called, and I loved my BFW (burger, fries, wings) boc. The burger was good and the wings are excellent. Loved the fries too. My server was on point, but they might need training on up-selling. But, no complaints, only compliments! Keep it up, Billy's! I'll be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. BFW! Burger, fries, and wings! It was delicious.
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Seafood steam pot! Delicious!

TyEv-vYv0xlDbylF8mi1wg.text: I always have a great experience here. Yesterday afternoon I brought one of my dogs with me and she got first class treatment! I love that this place. The view is lovely and the servers are awesome. Especially the server I had yesterday! She was very kind and attentive :) I'm all about the experience, but the food is also very good.

zHmILLizzIFAujvCCJ48Og.text: I tried to come here the night of my 21st birthday and was denied by some rude power tripping bouncer who said they couldn't accept my temporary drivers license that was issued to me by the DMV.

xquTsWrqt3GgJM4fbXU-6w.text: Shelby was awesome! We're definitely her new regulars and will request her every time. Me and my girls came out tonight, they were busy but our app came out really fast, we didn't have to wait on anything and nothing was wrong at all, and she was great! The specials were perfect on the drinks too!

CuNeTPklxeeE2qcavvT3Rw.text: Disappointed with food.  I stopped in on Fathers Day 2017.  My wife and I ordered fried green tomatoes which were pretty good.  My wife had the low country boil and I had the shrimp tacos as recommended by our waitress.  The tacos were supposed to be soft flour tortillas but came to the table dry, hard and cracking with every attempt to bite.  The shrimp was not seasoned and the slaw lacked flavor.  The low country boil was dry.  Really, food that was supposedly slow boiled came out dry and tasted microwaved, especially the corn and sausage.  The atmosphere left me not even wanting to go back as many other tables seemed bored with their selections as well.

D9sIhfIfdPOag0sLR8c6Dg.text: The place was packed when I went but they had room at the bar so I decided to sit there. They had some really good drink specials for happy hour, and it looked like each day has different drink specials for happy hour.   I ordered a chicken sandwich which was really really good. Much better than I expected from a place like this. The wait staff/bartenders were all great and very friendly. This is absolutely a place I'd go to again.

szU_f8HfhsEW3O8objbk5g.text: I'm in town visiting family. So we decided to come to the boardwalk to grab an early dinner!  The restaurant is really clean, and the staff is super friendly. The fried green tomatoes were SO GOOD. The coconut shrimp was pretty good too. Wings were also great. However, my burger kind of sucked. So there's that.   I was pleased with my overall visit though.

88rM1h-CJRmEOspYqyC1XA.text: The food was great but the wait was ridicules. 1st they said a hour 30 mins. But it turned into 2 hours 45 minutes. They need a better system. Said my table was ready for a hour and 30 minutes

sW6eo61smnOaUzrjHlDgSQ.text: I know you are right. You must be the same manager who told me your drink menu has a disclaimer that all drinks are final. So the truth is, I ordered without looking at the menu as I told you. I also told you anyone can have a bad day. SI if he has been there for 10 years, big deal. I still stayed, drank beer and the waitress who took care of me after was lovely. But the couple who was next to me, did not like the mixed drink they got from the same bartender who has been there over 10 years. So he may have had a bad nite or that is your standard of service. I leaned over and told them I had the same issue. They did not drink it and left shortly after. Your philosophy of walking past dollars to save pennies is not the best practice. But, you were not too helpful either. No matter what, I paid for all the drinks I received and ordered. But I have the right to post my experience and I have been honest. It is not a personal attack. It's a review of my experience.

ob5U8i7rYWCLNGU_EK_6qQ.text: I really like this place. The ribs are pretty good. My coworkers and I go from time to time. The drinks leave something to be desired I must say. I've tried to find one that I like, but so far I haven't. I still recommend this place because the food is worth it.

OV7Y2VMENwOh4ms-r5_zNQ.text: Been here three times so far, first time was just for a drink, we had to get carded and pay a cover, so I thought it would be a happening spot. Unfortunately, that was not the case for a place so close to a college. Went back for lunch on a football Sunday, got seated fairly quick and the food was good and came out fast for being a busy Sunday. Just had dinner the other night and food was fast and good.  The servers are younger people, probably from the school near by, which is fine, but the one I had last time I was there seemed to want to be somewhere else. I completely understand this, and we have all been there, but at least smile!    Overall, food was good, lots of beers and drinks on the menu, lots of specials through out the week, and plenty of TVs for game day.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Saturday special. Shrimp and flounder po boy

kySPmFJ_EubGzWeaOAtVrQ.text: Love this place. Lunch is amazing. Great atmosphere and location. and the chicken pita is dynamite. Great value and great food. Repeat customer.

5RXGPWtlFSpmUP50EKI3Ig.text: Champagne our server did an excellent job of serving our large 9-person group. Awesome food and good company! Thanks for such great service!

bq19IqCTzVZdf4eSNJP0zA.text: Came across this place while in town for wedding. Food was great, great beer selection as well. Victoria was a excellent bartender very friendly and knowledgeable about the area. Would definitely come back when in town again.

hyt7ZRLYsgF2JNL4aDeoAA.text: Love this place! Great food & great drinks! Garrett is always my server and he is the best!

eZAVrLvxU0dEh8JdINngxA.text: This place is ok. I'm not giving it more stars simply because it's just a typical bar and grill type place. Nothing is going on here that's going to knock your socks off.  I actually met up with someone here for drinks a while back and after a certain hour you have to pay to get in. No thank you. We decided to go somewhere else.  I've had a salad from here and drinks at the bar.

bR04HlIdNqUilmp3e-lmJg.text: Great atmosphere with good service! Fish tacos were very good, my only complaint would be, why not 3 tacos instead of two? Charge more if you need too. Maybe $13.99

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Fish Tacos

n49WsOHn05ExICphRCsE6w.text: We just left this restaurant after having exceptionally terrible service. We were there waiting for our bill for over 20 minutes while our server sat at a table chatting with what we are assuming were her friends. She clearly had no idea we were waiting even though our dishes were stacked on the corner of the table to make cleaning the area easier.   Having been a server consistently for the last four years during college I understand the temptations friends being at a table but you're there to work not socialize.  Once we got the bill we waited another ten minutes for her to come run our card and finally decided to just drop cash on the table and leave. We've been to this restaurant multiple times as we both went to UNCC and now live in university area and each time we have gone over the last few months the services has gotten worse and worse. We will not be returning.

EjpdoNfL0fbo_G8aKp_tUQ.text: Smokehouse wings are covered in a spicy chipotle citrus sauce. Pretty decent size. Just the right amount of spicy. I'd give the wings a 4.4/5.   I also had the ribs. Ribs were super tender. I picked it up and the bone fell out. The flavor on the other hand could've been better. I'd compare the flavor to an average bbq place.   Drink prices were decent. They had Jameson Cask-mates IPA so that's a plus.   Atmosphere was good. It's near a college campus so you'll get the college vibe type bar here.   Overall, good place to kick it on a weeknight or weekend.

XQcvaWH434_LEmcK7kIH5Q.text: Good food.  We had margarita's good flavor just small sized.  Venue - nice view of water and atmosphere. Disappointed they didn't have any ribs available when we came.  Still would recommend.

tSdzOJlf0YMM5taCjapTNQ.text: First time going here with friends. Service was kinda slow because it was the weekend and they were packed. Pina colada was good. I ordered the burger the comes with fries and tenders. The A/C was out I guess because the temp inside was 84 then jumped up to 85 but set to 70. Finally got my food had no condiments on my burger, didn't even care to tell me server because I couldn't eat a hot burger in a hot establishment so we ordered it to go. My friend left her Togo box after we had left and went back to get it and the waiter told her thanks for the $5 tip that I had left. Won't be returning

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

eUmBXx88Yqfj8cWu2hVmqQ.text: After all the years I still love the food at Boardwalk Billy's.  They have renovated the restaurant and put in nicer floors. They still have their lunch specials Monday through Friday 11am-2pm. We scooted in today at 1:50 and were able to take advantage of those specials.  I tried the buffalo chicken salad with the chicken dipped in franks red hot. Such a yummy salad. They don't disappoint! Everyone else in my party ordered a side of the fried green tomatoes and had nothing but good things to say! When I'm in the university area I try my best to swing by for some lunch .

Kmm2DGNMrmJh_a5mNaOXuw.text: Smoked wings are the deal here. Citrus chipotle sauce is unique in a way that makes you want to take a different route to make sure you can eat here again. The atmosphere is very causal and fun; great place for a colleague lunch but maybe not the first business meeting.

ltrXKSo4me5qsQENoNmd3g.text: We stopped be Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar & Ribs for a little afternoon delight but we were not delighted by the Hurricane Punch bowl we ordered! This colossal sized drink looked appetizing but it turned out to be a $22 glass of watered down punch flavored with raspberry notes and a pleather of ice with a orange slice draped over the side!   The Hurricane punch was so bad that we asked for a shot of something to give it some flavor! Aaron our server offered to bring us a $6 shot to pour in the drink!  FYI if you happen to come here for something other than the Hurricane watered down punch make sure you know exactly what you want because All mixed drinks are final sale!  I'm not impressed by the drinks or the service we received at Boardwalk Billy's!   I appreciate the owner reaching out concerning our experience so we will give Boardwalk Billy's another try!

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. The small glass filled halfway was our $6 shot...
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. This orange has seen better days!
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

lWwFL9h0U8Pquk7SPJejgQ.text: I have never written a review for Billy's until now.  I have been in Charlotte long enough to remember when they were across the way in the current location of the Famous Toastery.  Even then Billy's was a great place to go for drinks or appetizers.  I think our server tonight was a bit overwhelmed.  He may have had too many tables and kept forgetting things we requested.  For example, my friend ordered an appetizer for the table and he forgot to send it to the kitchen...thankfully it was on the house.  I then overheard him say to a fellow waitress that he had nine tables and he was starting to stress out.  Other than that, the food was good and the company was even better.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Staff get together

g9JGm_i61xzoo7cvxyXRaQ.text: Review update: ok I did decide to come back...never say never.  I stopped in on a weeknight, I think they were having trivia, so it got kind of loud.  I was seated really quickly, which was nice.   The waiter was ok, I think he was a little overwhelmed.  I got the mojito (coconut) and coconut shrimp appetizer.  They were both surprisingly good.  I would definitely get the shrimp again!! Great flavor.   So now I may come back again in the future!

kPti632BwHtCCLHIqPHA6w.text: WARNING: Ask about their absurd rules before eating here. They are not posted anywhere and go against everything that customer service stands for! If you are seated and order a drink or appetizer, you are stuck in that seat and may not ask to move, even if it is windy/chilly outside.   Want to ask for the manager? Don't, no help at all; respecting the waiters' and waitresses' rotations and sections is way more important than simply moving from an outside table to an inside table.   I hope the establishment realizes that losing customers by this rule is only hurting the business as a whole (a.k.a. moving a table from a patio waiter/waitress to an inside waiter/waitress is a "sacrifice" the business should make in order to maintain customer satisfaction and BUSINESS).   The lack of customer service from the hostess to the manager will ruin the food and atmosphere.

mX2eAWXFB5f6aFi3sH-_uA.text: Great food but horrible  service, especially  if you are not African American. Sit at the bar for good service.  We have problems with young, inexperienced  wait staff outside on the patio. Expand.... two waitresses ignored me and wife as we sat at our table. When we asked a 3rd waitress where put waitperson was , she was just very short and said, "she over there." Then she just left without  saying anything.  We left after 21 minutes  of no service. This was last year during the graduation.  I have not been back since.

DOfc164w32eo4fB-KcdpIQ.text: Overall a nice place to eat. The view of the lake is a beautiful touch while eating outside. The food was very good to say the least. I didn't care as much for the Mac and cheese I think I was expecting more of a "baked" Mac and cheese. The wings were my favorite part of my meal and the collard greens were seasoned perfectly and I would definitely eat here again!
