bC5OiKF7zna8DOJCQ6-luA.text: My first time visiting Boardwalk Billy's  was Father's Day. I anticipated there to be an extended wait, but the wait was 10 mins. 20 mins go by we still are not seated. The hostess advises that we were not on the list (after clearly checking in) and it would be another 5 mins. After waiting 30 minutes, we attempted to be seated. As we walked by 3 available booths. My elderly mother asked the waitress could we be seated at a booth, as she rudely walked away  and turned her back she said there is a waiting list for the booth. I followed the waitress back to the door to ask how long is the wait list. She  made up a time of 40 mins. Everyone we encountered before sitting down was extremely rude. I'm not sure how the quality of food is, but the customer service is pure trash.

Uzn_zJke2APlmX1LLmSJ6A.text: We walked into this place to get a drink while waiting for a table at a near by restaurant. The two guy bartenders were so funny and personable we decide to hang out there instead of returning to the place we were on a wait at. The atmosphere was fun and the food was delicious and reasonable priced. I'm so glad we came upon this place!

2FGrO6Yo6OwBWVs1k_4P0g.text: Not a good experience.  Kitchen made mistakes on orders, food was mediocre, place was noisier than we remember from past visits.  It was disappointing.

JouMQoOiHt_Q-BKHNKqgPA.text: Definitely one of my new fav restaurants! Just moved to this area and came across this restaurant and definitely wasn't let down. Ordered the crab cakes With hush puppies ( the hush puppies were soooo good) and a " rock me like a hurricane punch" bucket ( I like fruity  drinks and this suite me perfectly but still strong enough ). Everything was priced reasonably and worth every dime lol. Even my waiter devin was great and gave good suggestions on what to order. Will absolutely be back again.

b07KOycCUu2jW7LNaz3KCg.text: This place was just okay to us- service was great, food was fresh and hot. Not much variety on the menu, and the flavor of the food was just alright. Great location though, and seems like they had a variety of drinks to choose from.

f7ufVG3pPe2Jo5kr0vRmVA.text: I tried again. This visit included a 10 minute wait for a server when there were quite literally 5 servers hanging by the station talking and ignoring me.  My server came up to me finally , now in all fairness, she was the only one that was tending to her tables.  Since I waited so long I ordered everything at once. Drink - skinny margarita which is still a great drink. App - 1/2 raw oysters, at best they were ok. Dinner- low country boil, at best ok.  I've never had a low country boil served with absolutely no juices in which everything is supposed to be boiled in.  It looked like everything was just put together, not prepared together. I asked for a bowl to put my discarded shells in and was given a pitcher?  All I can say is that it's good that this place is a nice location.  Mike - instead of voicing how you hope that we'll try it again, why not make an effort to make it better?

6Ih4feKh23hzWnHffz6agw.text: The Cesar Chicken wrap and sweet potato fries were Delicious!!! I enjoyed sitting out back on the balcony on such a beautiful day!

Mp9RNTck7CRAPAk38ASjdw.text: I enjoyed my visit to Boardwalk Billy's. The chicken wings were delicious and cooked to perfection. Our waiter Tom was awesome and I will ask for him when I go back

I_pbaPW5-YErmG_SpAEq-g.text: I love the feel of this place. From the rambunctious customers to the attentive staff, this is a great place to bring friends, excited kids, and even grandparents.   Now to the food... I got the Buffalo Shrimp in the Mango BBQ sauce. It was so yummy. The menu is basic, nothing screamed at me. The drinks were ok, I've definitely had better.   I would come back with my girlfriends, if only for that mango sauce and the feeling I get being on the boardwalk. Next time, I think I'll try the crab cakes.

n76SBJ9nlNlBRg5cC4tw0g.text: they are outstanding; the food is fab and they always have 1, 2, or more great craft beers

mjlfBZr59OPiGjYcXElHHw.text: Great hamburger and great location!  Has a sports bar feel which I'm not crazy about, but food is good!

zL974po2t5TUQckvfXMc0w.text: UNCC location - Fun ambiance; sports on tv; Not incredibly loud like other restaurants at lunchtime. Great food! Had the steam pot...Yum!!!! A must if you like seafood! Hubby had the shrimp tacos. He was bummed that he only got 2 regular sized tacos rather than 3 he gets at other places. Service was spectacular. The server (Sharise?) and manager went out of their way to ensure a wonderful dining experience. Lots of selection for beer and cider. Would have been a 5 Star review if Hubby wasn't whining about the portion size. We will definitely be back!!!

Onv4XvXMKH9pG1oeFjQKCw.text: A University City staple, Boardwalk Billy's is worth visiting at least once. I suppose I've been going since 2006 when I started going to college nights. I'm not sure if they still do college night, but it's still a good place to visit if you're in the North Charlotte area. The restaurant is located in a  boardwalk area, by the water and other restaurants, so there's always a group, especially on Friday nights. They have a long beer list, large bar area, large patio and ample indoor seating. Great place to watch a game ( large TVs everywhere). My favorite dish here is the Fried Flounder Platter, its seasoned and fried just right.

bMPJEeGFd0-QXGvBYS8f-A.text: Came on a Friday evening, for the first time. They were very busy. Told us the wait would be about 15 minutes. They ended up sitting us in 6 mins. Ed was our server. Had a flyer to receive free wings if we purchase a meal. So we had the BBQ mango wings. My meal was 4 bone ribs, corn on the cob, and steam broccoli. My wife had pulled pork. Wish they had a steak option. Nice experience. Would consider coming back, but when we usually come to the boardwalk and walk pass, they always seem so busy and crowded. But we we will keep it as an option.

80bndChwIl6c5FR6zj8L2w.text: Try the mashed potatoes & gravy! Sardis Rd is better than University && try their Fishbowls at your own risk! Not always stellar quality of food but I never say no when invited there for drinks! *lmao* Not sure how solid of a review this is but honesty is key!!

YThey4YEvTYauh7a4Oed1A.text: I loved it! I had Kelsey C. as my waitress and she was sweet and very attentive to us. We ordered the buffalo shrimp, boardwalk salad, and fried green tomatoes. I recommend them all. Never disappointed here!

j5f075AUO2a0dvWUuEzz9A.text: My wife and I enjoy going here and it has become part of our restaurant rotation.  The food is always solid and the staff is always friendly. We have taken our one year old twin boys a few times and the staff if always very engaging with them and they treat us just like any other customers. The one time in which our food came out late the manager was accommodating and he took good care of us. I couldn't recommend the place more as both a family friendly environment or a sports bar that serves great wings with a solid beer choices.

ByZjVaeoiJ_uedqjQaNRaw.text: My granddaughter is a little picky so this is a spot she likes to go out to dinner.  The food was very good especially the fried green tomatoes.  We had fast service even though it appeared to be busy. The Jamaican Jerk Chicken is a very good option. It is a little sweeter than other jerked chicken that I've eaten but still good not too spicy.

FiGubxjdVIMjGr_CM7eVgQ.text: Stopped in here for dinner while traveling for business. Had the honey line buffalo shrimp with fries and a few cold beers. Good food and friendly bartender. Great for watching a game and bar had outlets underneath for charging a phone if you are looking to kill some time.

2Koi8UN6Fn_ReyVs5EpHLQ.text: I have been here Atleast 3 times and staff is always nice.  Of course some servers are better at their jobs than others, but that's anywhere. As long as I get served in a reasonable time, I'm content. My gripe is that sometimes they give peanuts as an appetizer and sometimes they don't. I want my damn peanuts ALL the time :-(  The food is nothing spectacular, but it's good for a casual meal. I have never dined in the indoor area. The deck patio over the pond is too awesome to to be cooped up indoors! They also have a front patio area for a view of the Boardwalk traffic.  Dogs can also dine with their owners on the front patio.  There is nothing bad I can really say about Boardwalk Billy's. It has become one of my favorite spots in the area. The atmosphere is casual and welcoming. It is definitely a great summertime spot.

dnAWi-4h4jprcE3ZbXS8pg.text: Best mojito I've ever had . Thanks Pete . I swear I will not go anywhere else for a mojito. Pete knows what he's doing I swear

zg5tTVFl04aFSxzIq_ThNA.text: I was in town for work and went to Boardwalk for dinner with my coworker. We were seated immediately. We then sat at our table for over 15 minutes without any service (not even getting a cup of water). Several servers walked by us and made eye contact only to keep walking. Saw several servers hanging out and chatting near the drink dispenser (which was next to my table) and no one saw fit to come take a food or drink order. Service was non existent. My coworker and I left.

arrOf18sQkrkW73bSBjfOA.text: Our service was amazing. The food was on point and our server Autumn was so patient with her fine ass

NwwTkIZBnd_WZpLGNB_vKw.text: I went here on a date with my boyfriend, cute location and good service. However, we both got the BFW (Burger Fries & Wings) and the wings tasted like fish/ seafood! Neither of us finished them, we even tried more than one to see if it might have just been one wing but it wasn't the case! They had a terrible after taste! Thankfully I ate them after the burger (which was great by the way), if not the wings would have ruined the whole meal. They really should have their food separate at all times!

0Ks2ua2XVpd_l3qorJ-A8w.text: This was my first time visiting here. It was before the weekend lunch rush, so we were seated immediately. Our server was very attentive and thorough. The food was hot and delicious. I thought the french fries were amazing. If you like patio dining, you'll love this place. It has great views of the lake and boardwalk area. Also, don't forget to check in with yelp; you will get 10%off your meal.

uNYYRy9sDDTbSp3a1cf-Kw.text: I had a pleasant dining experience at BBs tonight.  My food was good and I had a competent server with a pleasant attitude.  We all enjoyed the atmosphere as well. My wife and I drove up to have dinner with my son(UNCC student) and his three roommates.  They pushed two tabled together and seated up promptly.  Our server, Laken, took great care of us.  She knew the menu well and was able to make educated recommendations.      Our orders all came out correctly.  Laken anticipated the condiments that we may need and had them on the table without us asking.  My pulled pork sandwich was good.  The fried green tomatoes were just okay.  They had little taste.  That's fine because the portion size of barbecue was huge.  Everyone else enjoyed their entrees as well.     The dining area looked super clean.  They displayed a sanitation grade of 96.5.  The atmosphere was relaxed and the view from the large glass windows was pretty.  We all enjoyed our meal together.  Well done.

65kpopUkc3I_iOxgxPzBuA.text: Im not sure where to start...wait... I got it it,  Myrtle Beach in Charlotte.  I was not going to write the place up,  but thought I owed it to my readers.   ... and it just had too many issues to ignore.    Im not knocking Myrtle Beach,  just trying to set expectations.   If you read my stuff,  you know I try to be fair.   The atmosphere is a super relaxed mixed sports bar and restaurant feel.  Nothing fancy, but meets what I call the "box on the table" venue.   We had to ask for our box, with paper napkins, salt and pepper, catchup and mustard.   We called ahead and asked if there was a dog friendly patio to eat on.  We were told yes.     We got to the restaurant to find the "outdoor dog friendly" area was a sun exposed smoking pit.  It was okay as we were told they were cleaning off the last semi shaded table for us.     At the same time,  an employee of the restaurant (who was not working) walked up after us and asked for our table.  She got it... and we were sat in the sun... with Pretzel our dog.   I know,  it's my own fault for staying,  but I'm okay with sun.  What else could go wrong??   Well...  As we were in the Mahabi desert,  it was noticeable our waitress was leaving us without water for long periods of time... Im pretty patient,  but it became annoying and went to get my own water.  What became even more annoying was the employee that got our table was getting lots of attention,  and the night quickly turned into an employee reunion at her table.    I think every person that worked there came out and sat with her telling her "how cute her dog was"... Pretzel was insulted pretty much the entire evening.  ... and then... I saw it... gum all over his feet, yes gum... I was ready to go, but then the food arrived.    Okay,  food...   it was pretty good.  It was not awesome,  but was high end sports bar food quality.  We had the pork nachos,  they were actually pretty good.  We also had the blackened Mahi tacos which were totally yummy.   Jax had the cheese burger,  which was not good.  It was ball park quality at best.   He's 18 and was hungry and did not finish it.  ...say no more.    Bottom line,  not real expensive, food was okay, but I found the place a bit of a hassle for family dinner out.   If I was a group of college kids,  its spot on.

jE3SWDhP4Rq6BJhrDEARtg.text: This is a super fun place! We went for lunch, and even at 1:30pm, it was still packed with people! We were able to be seated in the bar area right away. The menu has a little bit of everything, from salads, to burgers, sandwiches, and tacos. There were a bunch of drink specials too, but I wasn't feeling well, so I didn't grab a drink today.  It took a couple of minutes for our waitress, Simone, to come greet our tables and get our drink orders; however, once she did, she was super friendly, and also took our food orders as well, since we were ready.  The location is in a shopping center with other shops and places to eat, as well as a lake that Boardwalk Billy's is close to. There are lots of big windows, that give it a very open feeling, so you can see outside and enjoy the view of the lake.  I enjoyed my turkey salad very much! There was a lot of grilled turkey on it, as well as the other toppings. I ordered the vinaigrette dressing, and it was fabulous. Light and it was sweet, but not too sweet.  We noticed as we were eating that tables kept coming in. It's definitely a laid back place. It's in a great location, and I will be back. Be sure to ask for Simone-she was sweet!

4N6ZSjNPpfuYkuO3sbguQQ.text: Would love to say I got to try the food, but I refuse to pay for the opportunity to order food.  I arrived at 11 pm (place closes at 2 am). Was greeted by a man saying they have a $5 cover charge per person.  For a restaurant?  After looking at the menu my party was probably going to spend upwards of $70 or more, but there was no way we were going to pay up front for the "privilege" of giving a place business.

_tsv0b2DsvrvN8vN8cmENQ.text: The food and service was excellent. I just thought it was ridiculous for a restaurant to charge a cover on a friday night when the place was 1/3 empty. Drop the cover, fill the place, and you make more money. Honestly, the food is good, people great, drinks good, but paying a cover almost had us go down the street. Just basic supply and demand.

H9HFTAnONiZCMY41zz8ctw.text: Service was decent and despite the initial wait time for a Friday night, we were seated fast.  The ultimate steam pot was exactly what it says...just some crab legs, sausage, corn and potatoes that were steamed. They had no seasoning or anything. Yucky! The fishbowl drink we ordered was crystal ball and it was pretty tasty. Now I'm not sure how much liquor was in there but no real buzz occurred.   It's an okay spot to grab something but just don't order the steam pot.

gkHxWKsOZvQJxBdc-cOaRw.text: Apparently I need to update my review of Boardwalk Billy's.  I visit BB at least once a week for lunch.  The restaurant is clean and the service is usually great.  Best of all, the lunchtime prices are fantastic.  I can get a full meal and an iced tea (plus free peanuts in the shell as an "app") for less than a meal at a fast food restaurant.  It's a great deal for a great meal and fun atmosphere.  My favorite menu items include the Buffalo Chicken Wrap, Buffalo Chicken Salad, and -- of course -- just regular ol' Buffalo Chicken Strips.  I always order the "Fire in the Hole" sauce on any of them.  It's their spiciest sauce.  I used to love the Blackened Chicken Pita, but they replaced that with the Blackened Chicken Tacos, and they're just not as good.  My friend/coworker typically orders the Pulled Pork Tacos; they're a hit.  Boardwalk Billy's is my go-to lunch place.

tP7Krl_ZLgHqT2CtuXEngg.text: We stopped here for lunch on our way to Florida. The restaurant is tucked away in the University Shoppes, so we needed GPS to find it! Well worth the effort. I had the Southern BBQ tacos, and my husband had the brisket sandwich. Delicious! Generous portions. Great service. This looks like a popular local spot for drinks and food.

qXVUtnDPrfYWHYUE1E39Wg.text: My friend raves about this place. We came to do college tours from VA. The first time we went, it was on a Sat night and the wait was super long, usually a good indication that it's a good spot! Right? A few months later, we came back Friday during the day, 6/14. Once again, a friend recommended this place. I was a little disappointed!  1. Our server was sweet, however she was slow and it took her a while to attend our table.  2. My food was cold.  3. My daughter ordered bbq and thought it was a sandwich, but it was just the neat and it was DRY!!! Mud friend green tomatoes were good. For an app we ordered the Crab Con Queso. It was delicious or we were extremely hungry!  Overall it was ok! Not the best and Ill go back if it's a last option. The area was nice too!!

VESAvPjgp6lmerNWJSU6hg.text: Went for lunch today, was immediately seated on the deck as requested and service was prompt. The waiter, Rick, was attentive and helpful. The Jerk Chicken tacos I ordered came from the kitchen quickly and were a perfect temperature and presented well. Not to mention they were also quite tasty! Will definitely recommend to others, and note too that they have a nice selection of local beers.

kkRFdOi03uaMxaG8deRo8Q.text: This place is my ultimate go to! Everyone here is super friendly and the environment is fun and diverse. The bartenders are all awesome and the service is always wonderful. Food and drinks are both great and reasonably priced. Always the place to be!

kQZ95QEG5Y3p-4C5XDWQJA.text: After my last review 5 years ago, I had to write another when I came back.  Boardwalk Billy's continues to be a really good spot for lunch. We came on a Sunday afternoon and it was a nice spot to hang out.  I got the chicken tenders, burger, and fries and they were all delicious! Everything was room temperature and well-seasoned. Service was also good without complaints.

LM4-dqg4G2hePEz7g0ow7g.text: Boardwalk Billys is a joke of an establishment. For starters, all of the food and cocktails are a ripoff. The prices are extremely high for the small portions of low-quality food. They will send out burnt plates, reuse messed up plates, and make sure you don't buy desert because some employees scoop your ice cream with their hands.   the establishment makes $5 million a year they refuse to take back any drinks, even if a bug has flown into one.  Behind the scenes they're terribly racist.  If a black table sits down, the servers immediately call the table a ratchet table.  Management are literally almost all on coke and don't expect a day at work without hearing some form of sexual harassment.  Overall, don't eat at Boardwalk Billys. The place was designed to drain your pockets of money and not satisfy you. Not to mention, if you're a person of color they don't want you there. The staff is one of the most racist I've ever witnessed. The saddest part of it all of that most of the clientele is black so that's how they make their money. Take back your business.

LBkBf4Ax1tqlRc3b6MuEGw.text: I have eaten here a few times over the years.  It is a good place to grab a something to eat and enjoy drink.  As long as the weather is good, highly recommend sitting outside and enjoying the lake view.  Inside is fine but rather noisy.  Menu is diverse.  They have BBQ pulled pork, chicken, brisket and ribs.  Also have some seafood (including oysters) and other chicken dishes.  I'm not a fan of ordering BBQ at a place that doesn't specialize in BBQ, so I opted for the jerk chicken.  Jerk chicken was decent.  I would order it again.  The sides (bake beans and greens) were decent as well.  My dinner companions got the brisket and crab legs.  They were satisfied with the dishes but nothing was a home run.  The raw oysters were good, but the waitress forgot to bring hot sauce with the oysters.  Overall, the food is okay, service is good, drinks are better, and the view on the deck was the best.

Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Crabs

lQ-aTJ4PH2TCvMGZN5UyNg.text: This is a cool place to hang out on the weekends- it's tucked in an area near a lake with walking trails and paddle boats. The restaurant itself has plenty of outdoor seating either by the lake or in front of the restaurant. We opted for indoors.   The service was good, food took a bit long to come out but they got everyone's orders right and it was pretty good! If you like spicy bloody Mary's, this is the place for you! I typically don't like Bloody Marys but this one was refreshing.   I got the ribs combo with wings and two sides (fried green tomato and Mac and cheese). I could taste the smokiness on both the ribs and wings - ribs were good but on the fattier side but the wings were meaty and really tasty. My sides were good...didn't blow me out of the water but I like having the wide selection to choose from. I enjoyed having different sauces they offer! I got Fire in the Hole and Spicy Garlic and I would highly recommend.   My one complaint is the ceiling- as I sat at the table trying to imagine what type of stuff can fall into the food.

qtBnvmngsBX_bBI2-wQeAQ.text: Shrimp tacos were really good! My cousin also enjoyed her mani tacos. Crab queso appetizer was lacking in crab but it was modestly priced so I wasn't expecting much

Bypl24PjlbkF_qBHZH60Vw.text: Had a great time at Boardwalk Billy's last night!  I was a little apprehensive at first because a lot of the reviews alluded to the idea that Boardwalk Billy's is more of a sports bar type place -- which it is, make no mistake -- but that the food was run of the mill.   We were both in the mood for seafood and were in the concord area, so decided to give it a try.    Turned out to be a great idea!  Short wait for two at 8PM on a Friday (10-15min) so we waited at the bar where we received fast, friendly service and well-made, well-priced drinks.     When we sat down, we were greeted by a very friendly server who answered some questions about the menu, and we ultimately ordered the Ultimate Steam Pot and a low country boil.    Everything was excellent!  The crab was well cooked, everything was well seasoned and the oysters were fantastic!  Price was as expected for two with drinks ($70/Tax and too) and well worth it!

BHKY2oDfki-QTLpXwHlA_g.text: I have dined here a handful of times and I always get unlucky with service here. I enjoy the food which is a shame that the service is so bad because if otherwise I would be eating here more often. The food is a little over priced as well but still very delicious.

LF-oGjS-Wcvu1HCEY2hBzw.text: I always enjoy a quick meal here but having Kyle as my server made it more enjoyable. He was friendly, vibrant and gave great customer service! Nothing like having a great server to go with a good food!

bPpa8Qt73KQ-vdtZMSKCeg.text: Boardwalks Billy's is a good environment to eat in, it's a clean restaurant as well, nice waiters as well, BUT..... they take about 1 hour to deliver food ! Wish they could serve your food faster but the food is a good solid 9 /10 ! Would I recommend this place yes ! But definitely should come and try yourself ! I recommend the brisket and the sweet potatoe fries btw !

JzNSQlgARby7DWJWJnur7A.text: Several items were not prepped overnight, so they weren't able to be ordered. Brisket was dry. Baked beans made pork & beans look 5 star. Save your money.

99Qkec_FSvFmxxTfpuZTMg.text: while the view on the deck overlooking the water and ducks are very nice it doesn't make up for the small portions. I ordered a 2 meat combo, brisket and sausage. the brisket tasted ok (not great just ok) but it was only 2 very thin slices. and the "sausage" was nothing but a plain hot dog wiener grilled. now I suppose an Oscar Meyer wiener technically is sausage but I definitely felt cheated. at $17 they could have at least given me 2 of those "sausages". I will never go back

D6VToT365olUfkE3jqXxKA.text: Ambiance/decor-4 Service-5 Food-4 Strikeouts-0/3  Either I was really hungry after landing on my flight here, or this place was impressive for what it was. My expectations were really low. Why? It's a seafood/BBQ/bar food place with tons of variety. This leaves me he question of whether the quality was there.   This places looks like any sports bar, which isn't what I expected before I walked in. The place was very icky maybe from the heat or just dried up beer. I just wanted some oysters to eat since it's pretty much the only place in the local vicinity that would serve it.  My server was pleasant and extremely efficient. I sat down with the menu, and narrowed it down to two in-house specialties and she was quick to help me decide what to order. Typically, I would get waitresses that ask for a drink order and then come back and then ask for the order of food. She did it all at once knowing that I only wanted water. Terrific!   My half a dozen oysters came and it was not only cleaned very well, but shucked smoothly. I couldn't do much better myself. The cocktail sauce on the other hand was sweet and not too sour, which was great because I usually hate cocktail sauce. Ended up drowning each oyster with it unnecessarily. These were good size oysters.  Next came the double sausage I ordered, and everything was perfect, it was tasty like a sausage should be. My only gripe is the ketchup, but being Canadian, I am used to a different kick of ketchup, and know that the US have a different supplier. The restaurant can't change that.   Best part was the bill. Wha? The bill? Yes, checking in for yelpers gets you 10% off and she gave me little to no trouble adding this discount. Go go yelpers! I'll probably drop by one more time before I leave back to Canada.

sDU8PCiaeKI7stdgwVpbAA.text: Husband got food poisoning from ribs we suspect? He was violently ill after we left. Tried calling 2 times to speak to manger to warn them or ask for advice...put on hold and hung up on. Let it go. But will not return. Jerk chicken sandwich had no flavor at all where is the Jerk? Waitress was friendly and excellant service. Food was aweful.  Took husband 8 hours to feel better was very sick. He threw away leftovers in fear they would make him sick again.  He never gets I'll stomache made of steel. So something was not right about ribs. Gave 2 stars for great service. 0 for food.

ZSV077gQsY3Mz8i2Axzn4w.text: They literally just pissed me off. They obviously weren't keen on trying to fix a solution. It was clear I wanted crab legs...no customer service the bar shouldn't handle the food. Don't even take the time to listen and make sure an order placed right. I'll still eat there but tonight was some dumb shit. I should've stuck to my usual. You call to speak to a manager it's like they ducking and dodging, Crackin Crawfish wouldn't have done me this way.

wn1MFrinUwGYvy7yzjWSfA.text: Awesome spot.  The wife had chicken tacos and I had the shrimp tacos.  Both were exceptional.  Service was great, atmosphere was calm (I'd expect nothing less at 1:30pm on a Saturday).  I bet this place gets better at night.

eiQd582H1nNPHIrdUHtFYg.text: I came here with my girlfriend to go on a date expecting good service. I come here to be greeted by 3 rude bouncers who expect me to pay a 5 dollar cover fee per person. I decided to try it out and the food was horrible. My oysters looked very odd and my girlfriend found 3 pieces of hair in her food. I wouldn't recommend coming to this establishment.

BGALXRucVQwrp8xi6Pfjsg.text: Great lunch today. Cold drinks, the crab dip was spicy and flavorful. Had the founder sandwich - great people size, prepared and presented well. Wife enjoyed her coconut shrimp. We would order everything again. Good noise level and a terrific view

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

YPUsfiDxaQnY1IqWcnEozw.text: My girlfriend and I favorite spot. Somewhere we go just to go chill and relax. I only had one thing and that's the wings and French fries with a Blue Moon. Never been disappointed.

XGdunjxREAlgNekp6SwOQw.text: I am in town for the Jimmy Buffett concert tomorrow night.  My spouse and I checked out your restaurant online ahead of time, and purposely chose Boardwalk Billy's for dinner tonight. We were really looking forward to some of your entree choices, but after being seated and then sitting at the table waiting for our server for over 10 minutes, we left. This was after several servers walked past, looked at us, but never stopped. As we walked out, there was even a group of staff gathered at the hostess stand.  Don't worry, we found another establishment to spend our money in tonight.

oUi0vQSlycLy85aJwLrFrw.text: The staff is pretty decent and the food comes real fast.  The price is decent and they have a great selection of beer and other alcohol beverages.   The food tastes pretty good and it's a great portion. But it's not the best BBQ I have tasted. It is more vinegar base than ketchup based.  The ribs are tender and it is well marinated.   Also, one of the plus side is they do have a patio and it is pet friendly at the patio:)

-xEyTfafCJ6bw678wEinvQ.text: I recommend sitting at the bar. They have a great beer selection and good bartenders. The service in the actual restaurant is terrible. This is a nice place to order some apps and watch a football game.

HnRLVjl7PKz2vZRC6xvSXw.text: Ehh... I was craving oysters after work and used yelp to search some places in the area. I completely understand that Charlotte is no where near fresh oysters, but I've had some good ones in the area. Here... I'll pass. Maybe they get them out of the pond beside the business. The mojito was good and the pimento cheese was good. (Probably because it was palmetto brand) I'll skip this place and drive to Concord for Full Moon. I was also expecting more seafood on the menu, but this is a bar with seafood options at best. Thank you Yelp for the 10% off my bill and 7% cash back.

AthJvPNul3NsMbZoWkLjmA.text: If i could give a review with no stars i would, where do i start? Well we walked in yesterday party of 6 around 8pm, there was a 45-1 to an hour wait. So we said okay let's go to the bar, we proceed to walk to the right side of the bar were it's 6 chairs, so the bartender immediately throws two signs on the bar. So it was a couple sitting there and they said oh yes that seat is taken, which was fine. So i proceed to read the sign and look away the rude, unprofessional and nasty bartender says " i don't know what she looking mad for and walked away. So i am thinking to my self i know she isn't talking to me a "paying" customer that way. So i walked out because i knew the end result wasn't going to be nice, needless to say all of us left and went to another place to eat. Customer service sucks and whomever the bartender was who was clearly having a bad night and doesn't like her job needs to either be trained or find somewhere else to work. They have forever lost my business

U_8Rj8F4Bz0jMTpVErYqlQ.text: The service and food was really good. The drinks were great and the service very friendly. Kristina and Clint were behind the bar and although it got busy they made sure were taken care of. I highly recommend this place and will be back again when in the area. Def get the ribs!!!

GvmygsubJwV2kCLyidP8Vw.text: Loved it! There were three of us and everyone loved the fresh fish and seafood.   The view and location can't be beat and our server was awesome.  Additionally, I appreciated their draft beer selection. I can't wait to go back.

267KVgDZwEIr8-e2_qenjA.text: I would not bother going here again. Service is sorely lacking. Even with the restaurant mostly empty, I could not get a server to stop at my table for over 20 mins. Four people standing around the host station and not one could care that there is no service. This was my 5th visit in 5 weeks and the last visit.

f5DG-Hs27GNkiBIXwG6L5A.text: Came on a Saturday night so they were pretty busy, but the service was good and the food was even better! I ordered crab cakes and they were as good as you can expect when you're not in Maryland. (Where I'm from) My wife ordered basic chicken tenders and they were amazing. It was nice to walk around outside by the pond and feed the ducks afterwards.

T9Emqh3Da5Pw1-0XfZ2PgQ.text: Great area. Water front view. Not bad for bar food. Good vibes. Highly recommend eating here.

gEjHikRdM4ZGnBJWRRXbag.text: When we were in Charlotte we ate at both locations and have to say Boardwalk Billy's had absolutely the BEST raw oysters we ever had!  Hands down!!!  The oysters were fresh, not sandy AND they were "released" from the shell by the person who opened them. That is a big plus to half shell lovers. I had the Mahi Taco which was excellent and my husband had a burger which he really enjoyed.  The atmosphere was fun, very casual and the wait-staff friendly and attentive.  You should really give this restaurant a try even if you aren't into oysters & if you are an oyster lover you owe it to yourself to check this place out!!

dJvNtQ18Y32CvXWgF-lG2Q.text: I was in the area for work and tried this place for dinner as it was close to my hotel. I got shrimp tacos and the chicken fingers with fries.The tacos were ok..a combination of not enough shrimp in each taco and each taco being drenched with too much sauce. I've had better. The chicken fingers were bland. If it weren't for the batter it was covered in, it would have been really unappetizing. Service was fast. The friendliness of the hostesses and servers could be improved though, but I probably won't ever come back here again (unless it's for work again) so I guess it really won't matter to me!

kVuBMH3ZEK5AaTui6tGQug.text: First time here so my thoughts may chance if I do come again. I came here with the wife to check this place out Since we were in the area. I ordered the pulled pork sandwich with the fried green tomatoes. The sandwich was satisfactory with a very Carolina style BBQ sauce. If you don't know what that means, it has heavy vinegar notes. The fried green tomatoes sucked. They were the equivalent to ordering the onion rings from BK Lounge. My wife ordered the 1/2 chicken which was good and again like me made the mistake of getting the tomatoes. If we do come back it will probably be purely be for drinking. As far as wait staff I give them a C+

KbxPUxuKkVHIuGCfjeMhhw.text: Very laid back restaurant/bar. Great wings and seafood options! The service is great. Lots of teamwork. The management is awesome and I can tell they get along great with their employees. They always have drink specials. They have live music on some nights. I def recommend this place if you want something quick and laid back.

l0x1nnCP5s8NyPPkmVhKPg.text: Came here on an early Friday evening and liked the vibe of the place.  Very casual bar-like place with an open atmosphere that pours out onto the man-made pond.  Bartender was casual and friendly, and best of all, made some strong drinks.  Always a plus.  Food was really sub-par.  Raw oysters had zero flavor in them.  You'd want a taste of the ocean in the oysters, but none was to be had.  Very bland and disappointing.  A steamer platter of oysters, mussels, shrimp, crab, and corn and potatoes was also very bland; and over-cooked.    I'd come back for the drinks, but not the food.  Nice atmosphere though, for a Friday after work chill.

SI1KP8cr1zSjypac_GYU6g.text: Good bbq pulled pork entree; the lunch portion was huge! We had some fried pickles as well.. Not the best, they were a little soggy. Had a top shelf margarita as well.. It was a bit on the strong side, but it did the job! Awesome view through the big windows, reminds me of restaurants back home in south fla by the beach.

9cMQ9K_NmBJEogFIroO_HQ.text: I love the food here. Wings are great, as are the burgers. Service is usually very good, even when busy.  They have a decent number of TVs for sports viewing, and this can be a pretty loud joint during football season or other major events. They also have a nice outdoor deck area on the 'water' (of the man-made pond), which is perfect for spring/fall...not so much in the summer unless you love the heat!

6Od-52AO1bS-vq5DdfxGhQ.text: Boardwalk Billy's while a popular college bar during the evenings is a staple of area work lunch venues. Though they have a variety of fried options, a good burger, and my coworker swears by the Buffalo Chicken Wrap (with Frank's Hot Sauce, Fries, and 2 orders of blue cheese dressing), what will surprise you here is the variety of their healthy options. Instead of fries, swap out for steamed vegetables! They have a ground turkey burger and what is quickly becoming my favorite is their grilled chicken salad with Mandarin oranges, candied walnuts and dried cranberries.  The atmosphere is very laid back with staff in shorts & peanuts in baskets at each table shelled to the floor. On spring days the patio outback is perfect for the mid afternoon office escape.

q8pFtXa8HUxpMkk8VURTiQ.text: I have been living in the University Area for about four years and most of my experiences coming to boardwalks have been just okay based on service. Most recently I experienced a server who personally made me not care to return. An average height guy with dark hair and a tattoo of a heart on his hand. (Description included due to the fact that this guy is hurting your business) When I asked for suggestions on what to order from the drink menu his answer was "absolutely nothing'. After one drink for me and two for the guest I was with he notified that he would only be able to get us "one more" due to the "law". He checked on our table twice, never suggesting water, never suggesting food. Needless to say our visit was cut very short because of a waiter who simply didn't care.

5Vmd9F6as9K0YCRRZh7hOQ.text: Great Grilled Chicken Caesar Wrap , he crab con queso is amaaaaazing!

qDmmX-MM-Fp5u43cLhfnyw.text: They serve peanuts and have everyone throw the shells on the floor - that says it all about this place. The dirty floor bothered me but I guess that's part of the "charm" (i.e. college kids can screw this place up and no one cares because it's crappy anyway!). I had a carribean jerk chicken sandwich and it was good - there was no spice to it, but it was more flavor that I was expecting! My mom got the pimento cheese burger with fried green tomatoes on the side and it was OK ("but it's no Pinky's pimento!" - Mom), too.   There are a good amount of TV's here and a view of the pond, so that's a plus to the locale, but the parking lot was packed at 2pm on a Friday, so parking at night or the weekends might not be a boardwalk in the park (har har har).  The food is OK, the service is OK, the location is OK. So the theme of Boardwalk Billys? OK, ok ok ok ok OKKKKKK, Oh-kay!

4ikyab1gZcSVrc6qjL-WUQ.text: Boardwalk Billy's is consistently mediocre. They don't try to do anything fancy, and they do a fine job of it. Their food is simple American fare: hamburgers, chicken fingers, mayonnaise, etc. Not gourmet, not well presented, not Earth-shatteringly tasty, but fast, cheap, and always good enough to enjoy.  This is par for the course at a University City lunch joint.

7pZaJ8T_Ll-c5keeLb-NCQ.text: Billy's ultimate steam pot and oysters are great. It sits right by the water too.

g5m4I-C0k_nwZjDd5KNHIw.text: Service is very slow ended up leaving after not getting served. Also they allow dogs in outdoor seating area a total turn off not a fan.

TsCJuu-XmezviJUUg95Bxg.text: Ahhh B-dubs you shall forever hold a spot in my heart!  Many, many a college Wednesday night spent at this place for 5$ pitchers followed by a cookout trip and the inevitable skipping of that 8am class.  Beautiful scenery, great patio, next to paddle boats, and food is pretty decent.  How can you not like a place where one of the menu options includes a giant burger, 6 wings, and a generous helping of fries!?!? And the loaded cheese fries are some of the best I have ever had for sure.

rSO_rOboojb_RpDhxmgwwA.text: Pretty good seafood. I've been here several times, some menu items are better than others. The BBQ sucks and so does everything that they claim they "smoke for 14 hours" or whatever bull the server mentioned. I would only come here for the atmosphere and people or friends. Our waitress forgot about us, she kind of sucked all around. The bouncers are never friendly nor the bartenders.

vnz3YLES2N_e4u08Obzh9Q.text: I have lived in the area pretty much all my life, and even worked across from here for a couple of years and have never walked in here until tonight. I came here with my girlfriends. We were seated as soon as we walked in. We waited for five minutes, with no server to greet us. My friends and I all used to wait tables, so we understood if he/she couldn't come immediately, so I gave a five minute limit before we decided to walk out. The server had 30 seconds to spare before the five minutes was up (talk about lucky!) before greeting us. My friends and I ordered drinks and split a pulled pork nachos. I had shared some blue bowl drink (can't remember the drink's name). It was really good, with a delicious coconut note to it. However, definitely too much ice. The melted ice diluted the alcohol that it ended up tasting like juice. The nachos were absolutely delicious. The server (can't remember her name) had redeemed herself from the long wait before coming to us. She was funny, friendly, and consistently came to check on us (we were there for a couple of hours). I absolutely recommend this place for some drinks and bar food on the patio!

YiHT3dsnGfD4qzmlzO-2zg.text: You really can't go wrong coming here for happy hour. Decent draft specials. Appetizers are good size and a burger combo with fries and wings or fingers is what I'd consider bargain basement.

2bapB8Isvo7aRhi4JZqPrA.text: The food here isn't bad but it isn't fantastic.  It suffices for typical bar grub.  I do like that they have vegetarian options that are not on the menu for those that are non-meat eaters.  The other plus is the free, and plentiful peanuts.  Of course, as the night goes on, the floor is covered in shells.  I'm not a fan of the bar atmosphere here.  The music is hit or miss.  The DJ/Band sets up near the the back and has a makeshift (small) dance floor.  The music genre on the nights I've been there  is highly variable.  Cover bands, metal/rock to top 40.  The drinks are not very strong but on certain weekday they have some pretty unbeatable bottle/well specials.    The patio on good weather nights is also a definite plus.  Parking during the day is not a problem but on Friday/Saturday night the lot competes with the Wine Vault and Bad Dog.    Not a place I like to frequent, but I wouldn't be totally miserable if it became part of my unplanned night out.

GD8aW931fJsZghHPcMPVuA.text: The atmosphere and location are great. The food and service, not so much. Had the fish tacos which were good but I've had much better. Others in our party thought the food was good but not great and some of us thought the food was not good at all. The service was very slow. At the end of our meal we all stood up and waited for our checks because we needed to go and it took forever to get them.

iLlyGJKOl-52xHXB9y_-Hw.text: We've only been living in Charlotte since the end of April and we've been to this place 8-10 times-it's THAT good. Everyone who visits us gets a trip to BB's. From the fried pickles, fried green tomatoes, and nachos to the crab legs, smoked ribs and wings-everything is amazing. Not one complaint. Great food, great service, and a very laid back atmosphere.

E-1oqC1DTv6xobpJwt-U8Q.text: Service was slow, server was inattentive, food was marginal and a  bone or something (?) in my food.  Not worth it.

9R19lCzBV9A8_VhPC0hkHw.text: Checked in here on Sunday with family.  The weather was perfect....sunshine and blue skies.  We were seated at an outside table so that we could enjoy the weather along with our food.  We received great service and the food did not disappoint.  Two of us had the crab legs and the other person had the peel and eat shrimp.  I am a crab leg lover and must say I was thoroughly satisfied.  The corn on the cob that accompanied the crab legs was delicious. I knocked that it first so that I could give my undivided attention to my crab legs.  Every time we eat at Billy's it is a rewarding experience.  My first time here was during a visit to Charlotte a few years ago.  We have since relocated here and Billy's is one our favorite places to dine.

Tc-HLjQSUNC_RFzYgZQLeg.text: Visited BWB on 5/10/16 with my bf..sat out on the patio by the lake and it was very relaxing. I had the fried flounder and shrimp dinner and it was delicious both were hot and crispy fried golden brown the corn on the cob was well seasoned and hot. My bf had the Q combo with ribs, chicken and pulled pork the ribs and chicken were smoked to perfection and the pork was very tender. I checked in with my yelp app and received 10% off our total. We will be visiting again very soon.

z4Spp-IFwHGP_uFP6d2xPA.text: We live close so we eat at Billy's a lot but never have been disappointed. It was the first time trying the Southern pulled pork BBQ instead of the usual suspects. It was good. And they sell Mecktoberfest. All in all, still good.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Always good.

XJvFG1iR_Hb6LrvFYjaWXQ.text: I've only been here once and I thought it was alright. My boyfriend didn't really like his wings though. He said that his wings were too dry. If I remember correctly I got the burger, wings, and fries. I thought that it was good and it was a pretty good deal for it. May try this place again whenever I'm in the boardwalk area

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

A8fZE9ou-yia1ZtAAqhFwg.text: I love the water so for me, eating dinner here was awesome. Centered in the University area over the lake, it was nice. The view of the water, geese, ducks, and turtles made my meal enjoyable. I loved the fried pickles!!!!! Our first waitress was not too friendly but the visit ended on a high note with a new waitress. The food was great and so was the atmosphere. Prom season so there were young couples everywhere lol. Great experience!!!

me2bH6Z6Et9S2HnbjX_2Vg.text: First time here.  Wasn't sure which beer to order (great selection) and my server offered to bring me a sample of the two I was trying to decide between.  Lovely patio on the water. Perfect Sunday afternoon ambiance.  Ordered ribs and wings.  Ribs were  fall of the bone tender wings crisp and flavorful.  Sides were not that great.  Fried green tomatoes had too much breaking-beans okay.  Service was spotty-wanted another beer and waited longer than I should have.  Good bar/wings type place, don't be in a hurry.  Is a family place-lots of well behaved children.  I would go back

hurAW6KwmRu1IEGrgUa49Q.text: Six of us ate lunch at BB's and it seemed like a fun place. Initially only four of us were there and we were waiting for the others to arrive. We sat at the bar to have a drink while waiting. The tattooed barmaid seemed a bit put off that she had to be working and felt as if she was doing us a favor by getting us drinks. Thank God it was only temporary to have to deal with her as the others in the group arrived not long afterwards. We were seated in the back overlooking the pond and were all surprised at how beautiful the view was. Our server was Alex and he could not been any more helpful or friendly while we were making our lunch choices. Everyone in our party enjoyed their lunch and Alex must have overheard us mention that one member in our party was celebrating a birthday that day as he brought out a cupcake with a bday candle in it. If and when we return to Charlotte, we would probably return for a meal tripadvisor.com/ShowUser...

_bgfPjadvjSlpvAFW2C7Hw.text: After graduating from uncc I barely make it here very often but I can say without a doubt they have the best wings in Charlotte. GET THE SMOKED WINGS!!! Don't get the regular deep fried.. Trust me.. They also have really cheap drinks and a patio with a great view.. Check it out don't be lame

DYKDbRdTfYPk7GprAIK70A.text: My favorite local restaurant in the University Area. Great environment for college kids and other sports fans. Good for lunch with the family aswell. It's a tradition that my friends and I go whenever they're in town.   Try the Philly Cheese!

dh7-KDmq_lpmQsMtx6T7MQ.text: I really enjoyed my visit at Boardwalk Billy's. I definitely have to give high praise to my waiter and have decided that I will come back again if the service is as great as it was. From the moment we got there our waiter was very nice and very informative. The food was awesome but good food plus good service really makes for an all around great experience. Shoutout to our waiter (Aaron I think his name was) he really put the cherry on top of the whole visit!

KPdoqFrYY38h9hhiO8ukig.text: This is a great place to go. Waitstaff and bartenders are friendly and quick. The food is pretty damn good. It has a laid back atmosphere. Expect a wait time if you are going on fri or sat night (you think most people woukd realize this but....). I highly recommend.

xA2p4fbHfBR6LvJgwNw7UA.text: I absolutely love Boardwalk Billy's. One of my favorite places to go whenever I am in Charlotte. The location is perfect - I usually like sitting by the windows so I can get a great view of the lake.   The service here is usually good, I've had a few instances where my waitress forgot about us. But it's alright because the food and atmosphere made it up for me.   Everything I've gotten here is good, my favorite dish is the coconut shrimp. It really is unbelievable. A definite must try. The salads are delicious, as well.  If you are in the area and want to try something new, come check them out. They're a great place to come with friends and enjoy a nice night out.   Enjoy!

dNPMLrR53EDG3Euh60AbYA.text: The perfect complement to a long day of height-conquering fears, crawls through barbed wire and jumps over flaming coals! lol I suppose I should clarify that we did the Warrior Dash in Huntersville prior to coming to Boardwalk Billy's =P  Our group consisted of 6 people and the staff was very accommodating. The wait was not long at all! Our waitress was very sweet. She consistently checked on our group despite the busy crowd that typically flocks a Sunday afternoon.  I don't normally care for bar food and mainly chose this place for the view. The relaxing lake view is always the perfect ending to a long day. I've been to Boardwalk Billy's a few times, but I tried a different dish this time and was pleasantly surprised. I had Grilled Shrimp Tacos, which is mango BBQ shrimp on flour tortillas. I traded one of my tacos for my friend's Blackened Mahi Taco. I got the shorter end of the stick since the Grilled Shrimp Tacos are SO MUCH BETTER! Should have just kept mine, no tradesies next time! ...jk =P Definitely try them though if you stop by!

2XdsJtBz94ITqEqslx-siw.text: Lexy was extremely attentive with a great personality. She made my visit to Boardwalk's amazing, and was super sweet to my dog, Whiskey. The crab queso is on fleek

rqGnuDLpvQodLClIqaSfjw.text: I travel frequently for work so eating out is a must for me most of the time. With that said, this restaurant is far above average. Plenty of personnel on staff that are all polite and helpful. Ben W. was my waiter and was top notch in his service and knowledge. I chose the Alaska Snow Crab Legs with corn on the cob and it was perfect. Came out very hot (steamed) and the crab was very flavorful with a lot of meat. The corn on the cob was cooked perfectly as well. I would absolutely return for another meal.

1QW8EAu3fq3IaQ0Hhl2M_w.text: The official name of this place is Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs. That is extremely misleading for a BBQ fanatic like me. The ribs were right off the shelf at the local Costco. No smoke flavor. Tough. Very little meat. If the word ribs is in your name, please don't sell me Costco ribs. The brisket was also not good. Extremely fatty, under-cooked, and again, no smoke flavor. I suppose I should have expected this given the bar-like atmosphere, but c'mon. The word RIBS is in your name!

sqCIy4fFCbkyc6jqbdkgVg.text: While sitting here trying to watch the SC and UNC game, my waiter approaches me and asked me where the rest of my party was...of course women are late somerimes...lol but in actuality i checked in and waited for the seat im currently in...so regardless of the eta of my guess im still a paying customer. So for my waiter to say i couldve turned another 2 tables while i sat at the bar was a serious problem with me. My drink order was placed so now my time is your time so treat me accordingly. Beyound pissed with the comment.

LP7SI0cWdJtFH8DahO6lAQ.text: Buffalo chicken tenders were pretty good but not great. They give you a lot for a good price but the fact they charge you a service fee for To Go orders is a little ridiculous.

ktqxwBRnfrDXtq_tWww8xw.text: Very good We had to wait 10 mins longer for our table and received free appetizer  Well worth it

EqCWlimR_xFmeMoX0dlcnw.text: When did they renovate Boardwalk Billy's? I haven't been here is years, mostly becuase the food was mediocre and the restaurant itself was a bit run down on the inside. A few friends decided to come here to grab some food and drinks. I was hesitant but came anyway. Much to my surprise, Boardwalk Billy's has grown up. The restaurant had a new look on the inside and it was clean. And the food was good. Our server was great too. I ordered the Boardwalk Salad, steamed shrimp and a side of fries. Everything was good, even the salad. I think they also expanded their selection of beers. Not sure when this happened bit they offer craft beers and sours now. And they have drink specials multiple days of the week. So I may be back to Boardwalk Billy's in the future to grab a quick bite.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Boardwalk Billy&#39;s salad
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Steamed shrimp with fries

HDZlXCgfd-0rFI_2MMsneA.text: Always the best fried green tomatoes in town. Love it here, and usually gorge to the point of needing to be rolled out the door. I've eaten here so voraciously that I think I've managed to get barbecue sauce on the ceiling. One of Charlotte's best places to chill. The ribs, jerk chicken salad and crab dip is are NOT to be missed.

Ngdh7Fy6CZ00pLyecTl_1w.text: Great environment and view.  Nice for families as well as childless adults.   Very clean.  Great service.  We were addressed right away and seated quickly.   The tables were well organized and utensils clean.  There is a great view of the lake if you ask for it.    The food was very good.  The kids really enjoyed it. I order the Q combo and choose chicken wings and ribs. So good.  And the portion was huge. The hush puppies were delish.  I had a side of mashed potatoes Erich were also good.   Everyone at the table enjoyed their food.     The waiter, forgot his name, was very good.   Young African American man with braids from Virginia. That's all I remember, but that he was professional, polite and efficient.   All the servers and staff seemed to be good.   I recommend this for anyone visiting the area.   It's in a nice outdoor shopping center with activities by a lake.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. View from dining room of fountain in the lake
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. View from dining room of a walk way bridge
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Peanuts on the table when you sit down

RjRPKINKT_cBp3B4v2W5Yg.text: I really wanted to like this place but it was a huge disappointment. I ordered the "Charleston crab cake" with fried green tomatoes and broccoli. The crab cake had more cake than crab and it was beyond flavorless. They covered it in panko so the crunch was nice but even slathered in their fake-out "remoulade" sauce it didnt taste like anything worth eating. For the price I should have known something was up. I ordered the mojito and I have to give them credit for using fresh mint, however it was definitely watered down. The service was good. I guess if you're just ordering burgers and fries this could possibly be the place to go.

6QzPPFaU6OStEighynnhDQ.text: Loved this place!! The shrimp tacos and they had great service!!! I ended up going back the Broadway three different times that week all the we tired was amazing my husband and son also joined me!!!

grQY4jjsNI0CWZgG1YsIqQ.text: Wow! They've stepped it up!  I haven't been in years of course but my must recent visit proved fun and delicious.  Had wings and they were bomb!! Atmosphere was vibrant,  fun and the staff was super cool.

--X8sscM8t7bWRybgeZEbA.text: Friendly atmosphere. Family friendly. Amanda, my waitress was wondeful. Polite, knowledgeable, friendly. Had my youngest son, who has special needs with me and she acknowledged him and was so nice to him. She is the reason they got 3 stars and not 2. Now, let's talk food. Yeah...I had their burger with sweet potato fries and chicken strips. The strips were hot and they were good when dipped in the sauce. Outside of that, the food was non descript. Bland even. No taste, just texture. Would I go again? Uh, wouldn't make a point to go.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Bland burger with cheese, sweet potato fries and chicken strips.

vmNQkuogzfl5j-hZCXU54A.text: Atmosphere: 2.5/5 Pretty loud. We had a three-person party and at some points, it was difficult to concentrate on the conversation. At the same time, we understood: it's a bar.   Taste: 3/5: The hushpuppies were pretty good, the crab cakes were decent, but they were expensive and the quantity was very limited. The fried flounder sandwich didn't have a lot of flavor.   Food Presentation: 4/5: The peanuts are a nice touch. Flounder sandwich is served in a basket, open-faced, and delicious-looking. The butter is served in a separate container which makes moving things around effortless!   Service: 3.5/5 Nothing special, but no complaints.   Cleanliness: 4/5: Generally pretty clean, our server wiped off our table with a spray because one in our party was allergic to peanuts (which they have on the table for you to eat while you wait for your food).

uNYbwb2HMjNGOvz50H6Icw.text: Great place & prices for seafood in the UNCC area, with mostly college students in/out. There's a enclosed patio sitting over the man made pond & a regular patio amongst the mini boardwalk.   Kayla was our super star server, as she handled all three of us simultaneously & with a smile. Especially in dealing with my old school Newark Godmother, she has no cut cards...if she didn't order Shrimp, don't put them on her plate LOL.    My Mahi Mahi tacos were blackened to perfection, yet a little dry as I was able to consume any of the tasty sauces. Yet, I made my own concoction of Tabasco Sauce & a couple of dressings & was good to go. The Sweet Potato Fries were really on point. Godmother got the Fried Flounder Platter that came with Mash Potatoes, Coleslaw & French Fries. My Goddaughter had the CrabCakes, & we all dined happily in the sun.   Kayla thanks for being a super duper trooper in serving us, we'll ask for you when we return.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Blackened Mahi Mahi Tacos with Pico de gallo &amp; Sweet Potatoes Fries.

uWAn06vCsAt56AVf5_QraA.text: Drinks were extremely watered down, to the point of scam. The fishbowl and frozen margaritas are not worth a penny of your money. Get drinks somewhere else

ubdvgXhHLPh--Mdke0RWSA.text: We had a really good time the last time we were here. Use the "NoWait" app to see how long it'll be and you can check yourself in before you get there.   The waitress was tentative and my food was perfect (I got the nachos with chicken).   My boyfriend liked his wings.

PNQB32BCiQOajpYKdwQJ0g.text: BWB has delicious seafood and reasonably priced, really tasty, drinks! I don't usually eat seafood being 3.5 hours from the coast, but BWB is yum!

p_AB5cVmEiqWOc6miWLEeQ.text: I am a regular and I  went to Boardwalk Billy's recently on a Thursday night and had a situation that required the managers attention. He was very polite and professional which rectified everything. It was win for the waitress,  a win for me the customer and 5 stars for SETH.  If I owned a restaurant I would want Seth on my team. Go SETH!

-zdC84BregGRENVRtWB-Lw.text: Nice visit. Waitress worked really hard as we had a large group. Eastern style bbq was very good. Will visit again. Every thing was as expected or better. Good place to watch sports as there are plenty of TVs

Iv3U3X-6BcPrsy3EFrNL7g.text: Poor service. Got seated immediately. Got drinks at 5 five minutes. Then sat there for 20 mins. They weren't overly busy. Then server came up, took order, turned around and immediately forgot it. Had an attitude when retaking order. We left. Won't go back again.

xK1v9dyN_2ViicAtqNILnQ.text: This was one of the last places I went to on Saturday night. It was Avery up and live place! They had live music, and the two guys playing guitar were really good! They have multiple flat screen televisions so everyone could keep up with the NBA Playoffs and the MLB games as well.  The waitresses are really cool and took care of me and my homeboy very well. They had a wide variety of sandwiches in their late night menu; I got the cheeseburger and made mine a double with fries. Very basic. It was good, the party was cooked well done, the pickles, lettuce and tomatoes were fresh and they even put fried onion straws I their as well. It was very very good!  I would come here again for sure! It's a nice, fun and relaxing place for a group of people or even an individual to enjoy themselves! I will definitely be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Cheeseburger and fries

rRGwWHGsk2LI4fDAY0oVMA.text: Love the chicken fingers in spicy garlic sauce. We come here often! Wings are amazing, as well.

u09HIWxV_BoD24HzA-yyMg.text: Loved them when I went. Their raw oysters on the half shell are large and great with lemon and Tabasco.

jU6ZGZ_oC5tTKMKQM7o23A.text: Had a great experience here. They were really busy and we were a large group but the hostess made it happen. We sat outside on the deck and the kids loved it. It was a little hot and the umbrellas were lacking (the fan was too loud and obnoxious). Our waitress was on the ball. Im so sorry I forgot her name. She was young and very good.  Our fishbowl was tasty (not watered down like most), food was so good and came out fast. The kid meals were adorable! A paper boat the kids carried and played with for days. Great presentation! We ordered the flounder sandwich (it was huge!), brisket nachos (OMG!) and lots of shrimp (perfectly cooked).

ViDttBBWpqVRZ9t7RYUk1A.text: If college type pub food is your desire, you'll be right at home. Oysters on the 1/2 shell poorly shucked. Lots of shell and no real prep work done. Steak was 12oz, I'm sure, but thin as an Awful Waffle breakfast cut.  Order for what the joint is - pub grub and be happy. I made the mistake of seeking more.

vuUJEeEc6q5tIG3TbIFzig.text: This place is a Charlotte trademark. Plus, the service is amazing! Olivia is awesome and will be sure you give you all the best recommendations with a smile. Gotta check this place out if you're in the Queen City.

R7tl8RiQ5UCaGdN8Y2GHMg.text: Not impressed with the pork ribs, but I will try the brisket before ruling them out. I'm a southern boy and did not like the coleslaw,, beans were not bad.

R-AzqzUPMMy-eworYiZvOQ.text: Very good seafood. Flounder on point, & fried shrimp is great. Deinks are nice & strong too. Pretty good sevice.

I8m0SWyk2C95NLAf1adgHQ.text: I used to come here at least once a week. This was my favorite restaurant in Charlotte.. but the experience I had a while ago has made me never want to go back. First, the manager is rude and doesn't care if you have an issue or bad experience.. Second, they change their prices from what was in the menu.. and you're stuck with the huge bill.. Shared a meal.. just a meal and 2 soft drinks with my partner and my bill came out to $50 plus dollars.. this was the first time that had ever happened and I had eaten that meal 10 or more times and it never came out to that amount.. of course I was pissed and asked to speak to a manager so I did and he had absolutely nothing to say.. and gave me a coupon for $10 off my next purchase $50 or more!!!! LOL that's how you treat a regular to your restaurant?! This place is a joke honestly..

Cb9u-ItklM4sb1QznA2Niw.text: This place is nasty. Not clean, and the food has no seasoning and the seafood prices are too high for the quality of the food

BmWFIeFuTG9m1dmRUmnnxA.text: Listen. I will be totally honest here. I did not want to go to Boardwalk Billy's. And I certainly did not want to write a review of Boardwalk Billy's. But my hand was forced. By whom, you ask? Not whom, but what. What dark force motivated me to write this, my first, and possibly only, review? Not what, but whom. Wait...her name was Laura. Her game? Serving fiends like me. And, boy oh boy was I ever served. My water? Never empty. My stomach? Very full. Just how many stars does Laura from Colombia deserve? Well, let's just say Yelp would only allow five. In short, the food was good, the beer was cold, and the Laura was incredible.

aKQMw4uEGKrUuco953Mdiw.text: Went over for an afternoon cocktail and ordered a skinny margarita. It was made and  served  in a small martini glass and the server spilled 1/4 of it placing down on the table. It was so sweet, tasted like non skinny had mostly agave and tasted no tequila. Then decided after my bike ride I was hungry so ordered a buffalo chicken wrap which the server said this batch today is super spicy and since I like spicy that suited me. Then she said oh the fries are typical width and covered with seasonings. The wrap was ok, though not even mild spice. It was mostly flour tortilla doubled over, then the fries , yuck, limp, sad, mushy, and would you believe , no seasonings . Needless to say I ate most of the wrap, none of the fries and was sorely disappointed in the drink. These are not difficult orders or highly unusual. The server asked if we wanted a desert and when we declined she brought the check. I will not be going back and this was my first visit. Terribly subpar food and beverage. I guess since most of the drink menu comprised of pina coladas and frozen daiquiris type sugary drinks, I would have fared better with one of those. It surprises me this place has been in business all of these years.

REftQ5TjVOFHe7DxcRqSFw.text: I really liked the ambiance of the place. we like to eat outside when it's warm out, it's loud and fun and the food is good! I'd rate the chicken tenders a 9 but the burgers a 7 (which is what we had) I'd definitely go back again with a group of friends. They occasionally have live music and it's really fun! 7/10 would recommend to a friend

1_F6JpNEehTN6j3qcJDOaA.text: This place is a joke. The pretend manager Seth and the flunky bartenders with the smart mouths are ridiculous. If your going to give out information the least you can do is make sure it's accurate. Do not tell a customer to come inside the store and place an order when your website has malfunctioned then when they get there you look slow in the face and say oh the kitchen is closed. I could have not wasted my time and gas and I could have taken my business elsewhere. And the next time your conducting business with a customer tell your piece of bartenders to stay in their place. I'll be sure to let everyone I know so I can ensure they go somewhere where their business is appreciated. Every time we come here there is an issue smdh!!

HhYqKCVCuFc0LbPg1StOww.text: When I walked in I was greeted by rude bouncers that laughed when they were having a special for uncc students and I asked if cpcc students were able to get A discount too. We also had to pay a 5$ cover charge for nothing.  They where out of almost all shots and my lemon drop was just lemon vodka I love the food but not too happy this past trip.

1RKHxlK2-8d2TGFQfe08Vw.text: Boardwalk Billy's location is prime; you get to eat with a view.  Its in the university area of JM Keynes; if you're familiar with the area, its where the Hilton is & the giant pond.    The food is alright; I like the blackened chicken pita & the chicken fingers.  They have free peanuts at the table, try not to fill up on them!  If you like ranch, they have pretty good homemade tasting ranch.  I typically go at lunch & they throw in a free sweet tea.    The service is good; mostly college kids working there.  Today we were served by Kelsey; she was super sweet & let us know about downloading their app for deals, including free lunch.   You can't beat free food.  I'll be back for sure.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar And Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Free lunch!

_DfyD9o1bKBJsxt1d4y9gA.text: A great late night slot, the food is good, the staff are prompt and friendly and they have quiz nights, from the few times I went there I had a great time. Nice place to take a date or just grab some food with friends. It's in a really nice and safe area over looking the boardwalk. If you don't mind spending 20 on a well portioned meal definitely one of the better places to go. Parking isn't always abundant but that's not really their fault.

rJMmgeE5JlFPyLOqd9q_4w.text: Food always good and plentifully...I would advise not to go with a group of 8 or more as you will be hit with an 18% gratuity and the service will suck (as the server will take care of other tables KNOWING your tip is secured)

k12jVxHYU7AOscKDWRT8bA.text: The service was poor. The staff was more interested in the games on the screen than my order. I had the fried flounder sandwich with cole slaw and fries. The fries were too salty, the coleslaw tasted funny and the sandwich was acceptable. For artificially flavored lemonade, it was OK. I won't be back and I won't recommend this place.

a3sZW9XVA1VP8Wyr7PloQQ.text: Was so excited to visit the restaurant because of the raw bar, I ordered 1/2 dozen raw oysters, which was just ok. My entree was the crab boil, which disappointed me. The meal had no taste, I asked for Old Bay seasoning for flavor. The Seafood pot was watered down, the potatoes were watered logged and soggy. Was very disappointed.

77biSttDgXY-ojCUxBdZXg.text: Best thing here is the peanuts they give you free when you sit down. The drinks were pretty weak also!! Good social place to chill if you don't like big crowds & just want to be in your own section with your friends. Makes you feel like you're at the beach in some ways, but then you realize it's just a dirty pond outside.

8O01_qdaNXn1ZprhhfZV1w.text: This place is great. Clint and Pete made me the most phenomenal drinks on my 21st birthday. Josh made sure to check my ID and he was really good at it.  I will definitely be returning to boardwalk Billy's. I even liked Joshs beard. Make sure to try the wild watermelon!

eNfrNbuWLJVviarNP31HJw.text: Abby has been a really great, attentive server! She's been on top of our orders and very friendly!   Edit: got the smoked wings with hush puppies and broccoli and everything is hot and delicious !
